Um jogo simples e surpreendentemente bom, mas já vou avisando, se você não tiver paciência de tentar, tentar e tentar nem chegue perto, porque a quantidade de vezes que você irá falhar (e eu digo, falhar em repetir a mesma coisa até conseguir um final diferente) não está no gibi.

Uma dica para quem vai iniciar agora, observe bem o HUD, isso vai te ajudar a avançar no jogo, além de uma dica na descrição do jogo também.

Confesso que para conseguir o final verdadeiro eu tive que olhar o guia porque quem descobriu como fazer/chegar no final 16 ou 17 sozinho, realmente ou é muito sortudo ou ficou várias horas pra chegar nessa conclusão.

Mas sobre o guia, primeiro tente fazer o máximo possível por sua própria conta, acredite, vai ser mais divertido assim, e quando terminar uns 12~13 finais, acho que pode ir para o guia porque as coisas serão muito mais difíceis.

38810139.review:
看着攻略通关来了写一篇（碎碎念的）长评。游戏虽然有点短（结构受限也不好加长了），但还是有意思的，居然还免费真的很良心。普通结局不是很有意思推荐看攻略刷齐，隐藏结局还是建议耐心体验。
以下包含（隐晦的）剧透。
没玩通关的人有可能看不懂。


[spoiler]首先这种用很多的周目来讲一个完整故事的结构对我来说还挺新奇的。随着男主角未宇告白失败的种类增加（结局收集量增加）熙轨会有不同的对话，而四块拼图也逐一出现，塑造了一个主线剧情上的发展。尤其是隐藏周目之间。最后全收集破坏游戏文件简直非常赞。但是对于普通周目，这个发展并不明显，各个周目之间的区别主要还是最后被拒绝时候的短短几句话，这也就是一些玩家提到的“重复太多”的问题。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]虽然游戏介绍里说什么“不看攻略几乎不可能通关”，但是事实上让我感到卡关的仅是从普通结局（1-15）进隐藏结局（16-17）那个步骤。那归根结底是因为我没有真正领悟到这个游戏的关键：周目间关系性发展。每个周目的房间不是独立的，而是与旁边的周目有关系的。在我因为“重复太多”而以为周目发展只是一个未能被充分发挥的亮点之时，在我不知不觉间忽略了周目之间的联系之时，这游戏狠狠的摆了我一道，出了一个用一个完整周目来进入后一特殊周目的关卡。但“周目发展”这个亮点还是不能说是被充分发挥了的，因为在冗长的普通关卡里，周目发展很不明显。但在隐藏的那个节点，周目发展就瞬间加强，这个跳变导致玩家（我）想不到进隐藏的正确方法。（在这点上为难玩家有什么意义呢？）而逐一出现的拼图碎片让玩家早早就拿到了道具“小刀”，但这刀却在进隐藏周目之前没有用处，令人费解。开发者可能原本想用这一点来提醒玩家小刀在某个普通周目里使用才能有特殊效果，但是我完全没领会到，因为小刀的用法居然是仅仅要带在身上然后（加上其他一些条件）告白失败然后灰溜溜的走掉，这既不instinctive也不够make sense。这一点上我觉得设计很不成功。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]从审美上讲，我是很喜欢这个游戏的艺术风格。音乐非常迷人，画面很精致可爱，比如水杯满和空的两个状态和变化都看起来很舒服。游戏有一些难以被注意到的细节加强了游戏体验，比如当正确完成进隐藏的普通周目的时候，阑珊拒绝时有一个特殊的音效；进隐藏状态不同，封面的人物轮廓有时候有一个有时候有两个（有时候有零个）。以及，若是在集齐全部15个普通结局之前正确达到了进隐藏的普通周目条件，下一个周目会是空教室，这样就比直接忽略隐藏判定更能提醒玩家“有特殊的事发生了”。我遇见过一次空教室，可惜当时我没有意识到是由前一个周目导致的。游戏也有一些细节上的小毛病，比如从右侧上下讲台的路径很窄很奇怪，熙轨的立绘只有一个紫色的轮廓而阑珊却是有图片的实体。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]感情塑造上来说我觉得还不错，但是没有很泪目的感觉。我觉得最感人的点是玩家本来以为未宇伤害了阑珊，有一个”未宇的爱是自私的“这样一个心理预期，但是在最后又被彻底打破，未宇的爱的无私被[strike]越描越黑[/strike]加深塑造，这种反差[strike]很萌[/strike]很能制造情感冲击。[/spoiler]

很精巧的RM文字冒险小游戏，剧情完整而且也具有一定的戏剧感和感染力。剧情发展要说出人意料倒是也还好，相比之下还是简单纯朴的男主的1愿望比较有感人。没有什么特别厉害复杂的转折，就像一个谁都有可能想到的故事一样。

38641129.review: Acima de tudo, é fundamental ressaltar que o surgimento do comércio virtual não pode mais se dissociar dos procedimentos normalmente adotados. Gostaria de enfatizar que a adoção de políticas descentralizadoras afeta positivamente a correta previsão das diretrizes de desenvolvimento para o futuro. Nunca é demais lembrar o peso e o significado destes problemas, uma vez que o aumento do diálogo entre os diferentes setores produtivos obstaculiza a apreciação da importância das formas de ação. O que temos que ter sempre em mente é que a revolução dos costumes apresenta tendências no sentido de aprovar a manutenção das condições inegavelmente apropriadas. Do mesmo modo, a determinação clara de objetivos ainda não demonstrou convincentemente que vai participar na mudança do investimento em reciclagem técnica.

程序员写的破程序能把你坑一整天之《告白日》

该游戏场景单一，就一个场景；剧情单一，来来回回各种表白失败；游戏性几乎为零，内容枯燥乏味，还不断重启。
然而——强迫症患者红色预警！
别看这游戏免费，轻轻松松让抖M群体付出一整天可是毫不眨眼。为了刷结局，期待有什么意外内容，会让强迫症患者投入大把大把的时间来反复刷剧情。然后当你发现原来程序脚本就是这么写的啊，顿时有种被坑的感觉，大有玩《史丹利的预言》的同等感觉。

如果要跳坑，请在找到规律以后，把1-15结局刷完后寻找攻略。

评分：6/10，混蛋，你赢了。

38623197.review: "Confess My Love" is a hysterical look at one guy's perception. How it's 'supposed' to be rather as something that's not. He keeps getting shattered by it and every time you accomplish something. You are supposed to act like it's a downfall. I saw it as not. You acheive something and it asks, "try again." It's short, if you can survive five minutes it makes you want to play it again, over and over. I spent roughly a few hours playing it and haven't unlocked everything. But every time, I must know how it will end. It's funny, and the way that it's tragically a downfall you do it over again. You have to go in that you'll be rejected over and over. If you do that, you'll see the error and the comedy of your ways. I recommend it.

38398687.review:
Confess My Love is a gem in the world of indie games. Sometimes indie games can pull off what even huge developers can't. If you have some time to kill, try out this game.

Confess My Love is a seemingly simple game. An isometric layout and only one room with 3 characters in total. You're left to explore this mysterious room and follow the bumbling protagonist, Willie. The more you progress, the more strange things you notice about this seemingly simple room. I'll leave you to figure out the rest.

It takes a while. You may be tempted to drop the game; don't. You have to get to the very end of this artwork to appreciate it.

Kudos, LR Studio!

Lastly, don't let this game get spoiled for you cause experiences only work when you don't know what is happening next. Anyways I would rate this game 4/5 stars I would give it 5/5 if the ending was better, and I got the thing I talked about in the spoiler section. Otherwise it is just an awesome free game. Also If you are sick of waiting for a few minutes till it is the time were you need to talk to the girl you can go to the teacher desk and pressing z on the paper you can interact with. 38103533.review:
[h1] 杂七杂八的小感想[/h1] 
开篇先说一句，这个游戏是个挺好的游戏，个人感觉看着社区里的攻略推进剧情并没有任何问题。如果想自己收齐全部成就的话说实话稍微有点困难[strike]（或者是我太菜了）[/strike]
（讲道理一开始那1-9的成就……没有任何道理可言好吗（除了学会了了一堆婉言拒绝告白的操作（学会了有个鬼用）））
如果一心想要自己探索的话，这边给1-9的成就一个提示吧ovo，其他的可以参见社区攻略。
[spoiler] 请注意时刻 [/spoiler]
看着攻略收全成就的话，所需要的时间大概是2小时这样。[strike]如果你是个手残的话，可能需要更长的时间。[/strike]
对了对了，收完一定数量的成就之后，和熙轨妹子的闲聊内容会变，不过应该是不影响流程。[strike]熙轨妹子好可爱[/strike]

[h1] 那么，是时候评论了。[/h1] 
其实，我是想强烈安利这个游戏的。至少在收了大半成就的时候。这个游戏的设定还是蛮有意思的，而且剧情也没有想象中（和一开始玩的那样）简单。

下面一句话可能会使你猜到剧情的部分发展：
[spoiler] 最终的结局……讲道理可能不太尽如人意。归根结底感觉还是被成就系统给误导了……（是我想当然了吗？））[/spoiler]

下面一句话可能涉及剧透：
[spoiler] 求求你了，最后一个成就的名字叫“等下”，我特喵还以为故事会峰回路转，结果把我抑郁的不轻好么！我收完全成就直接失去力气好么！ [/spoiler]

在游玩过程中和全成就之后（也就是现在嗯）我一直在思考，作者设计的这个游戏，到底想要表达什么。失败的情感经历？年少时期的遗憾？彷徨和绝望？故事中途的转变究竟是作者为了引出最后的结局而刻意设计还是有更深层次的情感波动在里面？我想，可能很难给出一个答案了。[strike]而且开发商做完续作之后还解散了。[/strike]

总之，如果无视这个游戏略带奇怪的操作感（比如明明是一面平平的墙壁走的时候会被卡啊讲台感觉很难走啊啥的）单纯看剧情，我觉得这个游戏还是很棒的。况且，况且他还是一个免费游戏。

38002156.review:
部分剧透！！！
玩了一下午一共三个小时，全成就通关不知道算不算快的（部分看了攻略）。
就一个免费的国产独立游戏来说，算是个精品。游戏所想描述通过男主的一次次表白慢慢揭开，直到最后的真结局才恍然大悟，真不愧是“失恋模拟器”。

先说说优点。游戏的叙事手法很新奇（虽然我之前也见到过使用类似叙事手法的游戏，比如《教室里只剩下我一个人》）。
音乐我很喜欢，特别是标题界面的音乐和最后通关的片尾曲我都很喜欢。游戏通关最后的“假”删档让游戏毫不拖拉含糊，增加了游戏的代入感。（虽然隐藏成就就是恢复新档）
虽然游戏整体看起来有些粗糙但是人物的立绘还是挺可爱的，可谓是粗中有细。
免费！虽然游戏是免费的，但是在我看来这种水平和游戏时长的游戏定价个6-12元问题是不大的。可能是商业策略的原因？为了靠这款游戏来增加工作室的知名度？虽然悲伤的是：这个工作室在做完下款游戏后已经解散了...
细节丰富。每一周目大概都会有些许的不同比如人物对话。

再说说缺点。由于游戏场景是斜的，人物行走又是直的；操作有些别扭，有些时候操作会很不方便，不习惯。且按一下前进键向前的幅度太大，有时候互动会比较麻烦。（也可能只有我会这样觉得2333）
游戏整体的制作较为粗糙，我第一次看到这款游戏是的确没有太多玩的欲望的。
由于叙事手法的问题，可玩性较差，n多周目的尝试有些无聊，且没有攻略是比较难全成就通关的，但这也可以归咎于游戏内容的问题，也可能是因为制作组想做一个纯粹的叙述失恋故事的游戏。在这点上我也不太好判断。

总的来说，这是一款很不错的游戏。利用你大约三个小时的时间来品读一个故事也不失为一个好选择。况且这是一个免费的国产独立游戏！当然我也诚挚的希望，失恋的人别玩这游戏，不喜欢这类游戏的人别玩这游戏！
以上！

37991186.review:
Confess my Love is a cute little RPGMaker game with very basic elements, short and bittersweet. 
The main character is a nice guy that keeps being rejected by his love interest. Each new playthrough offers different stuff to examine or items to collect, although those are very limited in scope and number, and new dialogue options are unlocked. The game works on two levels: Time and Conditions. There is a clock that will count up to 5 minutes, during that timespan, you can confess your love and collect \ use items, combining their usage with the passing of time.

Admittedly, of the 20 endings presented by the game, the first 15 are entirely based on your patience (they all require you to do something at a certain time) while the remaining 5 are based on luck (a certain condition has a 1\3 chance to be met) so chances are you will have to repeat the process at least a couple times. All in all, the flow of the game is quick enough to keep you busy but I would have personally preferred a quicker clock - not a real-time one - maybe 30 seconds equals 1 minute in game would have been better. Regardless, that's a minor complaint, the story is already short as it is.

As a simple story, once you start figuring things out a little, you immediately know where it's headed, but in this case it's not a disappointment. It's competently done, tells what has to tell, and fades away like a fleeting memory from another life.

37777135.review:
Confess my love.
为什么是Confess？中文名字直接就是告白日，但是英文的Confess是告白吗？
Confess，动词：告解，坦白，对自身罪孽的陈述。
我曾经也暗恋过一个女生。虽然内心对她喜欢到无以复加，但是我没有像本作男主一样告白。我从喜欢她开始到因为分班而分开，都没有表露任何想法。
喜欢一个人是罪吗？
不是，因为你没有对其他人造成伤害。
是，因为这种感觉和背负罪孽一样令人心神难安。
本作究竟在讲什么？男主被拒绝的故事吗？失恋的模拟器吗？好人卡获得记吗？
都不是。它想说的只是：如果你的心里有喜欢的人，不要犹豫，请赶快，趁着还来得及，趁着这份思念还能够传达到对方那里的时候，
让这份思念到达期望的彼端。
对，我的意思就是，不要像我一样，都分开六年了还在惦记人家，我自己都觉得自己恶心，哈哈哈。

37678787.review: Confess Your Love is a neat little game in which you try to confess to the girl you love, very simple concept. Eu diria que esse jogo é no mínimo inusitado. Ele mistura vários climas: tem uma pegada melancólica, um design fofinho, um tema inicial engraçadinho e umas partes meio assustadoras. É do tipo de jogo que sabe brincar com a sua curiosidade, porque tem muita coisa acontecendo por trás da tela e há algumas pistas disso desde o começo. No começo ele pode parecer um pouco monótono e aleatório, mas se você prestar atenção em todos os elementos ao seu redor tudo vai se encaixar. Acabei jogando ele todo de uma vez (com a ajuda de um guia, admito).
Eu não recomendo esse jogo pra você se você não é uma pessoa curiosa ou se você tem preguiça de repetir os mesmos passos/processos algumas vezes, porque pra jogar é basicamente isso que você tem que fazer.
Agora, se você gosta de jogos ricos em história, que brincam com gêneros e que te surpreendem no final esse jogo é pra você. Vale a pena checar, porque ele é grátis e dá pra jogar tudo em menos de 4 horas. Eu não esperava me divertir com ele mas acabei achando bem legalzinho.

36634388.review:
(This is from my blog - Kayas Arcade as a part of my 52 games in 52 weeks challenge)
https://www.facebook.com/Kayasarcade/

Week 32
32/52
Confess My Love 
Platform: PC
Time: ~2 hours
Genre: Free-2-play, indie, story

Confess my love is a little free title I have wanted to try for a while now actually - And it fitted perfectly, now that I have been behind. 

The game is about - confessing your love - to the girl you like in class. You decide how/when you are gonna do it, if you're gonna do it at all. 
The game "resets" after every time you either leave class, hesitate, confessing your love or waiting for your love to leave - Every decision give you a different ending, and some endings are opening up for more choices. 

It's a quite interesting game, and a neat little concept of a story. Rather sad too. 
It gets pretty frustrating quick, but when you finally find out what you are missing it give a rewarding feeling of "some kind of progress". 

I like this simple way of telling a story, and I can easily over-analyse it. Haha. 

If you just want a short little 'story', you should try it.It's a cheap (... free is pretty cheap, right? ;)) way to try something different.

The idea of the game is better than the game IMO tho.

36624787.review:
You will not be prepared for the beauty, horror, sadness and fantasy of this little gem when it hits you. But that's the most genius thing about it: it's an unassuming little title with more to offer than it seems.

Going into this game, it seemed to me like it was just going to be a cute and simple little game. After all, it was free, the graphics were simple, and the game itself seemed simple: an RNG/time-reliant love confession simulator that takes place all in one room, and with only three characters.

But all of that simplicity is its beauty: this game builds upon its various, sometimes arduous-to-get, endings, and its ultimate ending can only make sense in a simple, low-populated environment such as this game's setting.

Work for all those endings. Use a walkthrough for the later ones if you need it, because the true ending of this game is incredibly worth it. It puts all of your rejections into perspective, and explains the point of all this heartbreak and why it keeps happening.

This is the most amazing game I have ever played for free, and I recommend it to all.

36607089.review:
It's not as horrible as I was thinking.

The time mechanic is designed so you don't 100% everything in about 30 minutes. The game forces you to wait, so naturally I played another game while fiddling with this one. You're probably wondering if I got the full experience from the game... but no, I didn't. The whole thing ended up just ruining the game's attempts to pull at the heart strings.

Game: "OH NO SHE DUMPED YOU AGAIN HOW SAD ARE YOU"

Me: "What? I wasn't paying attention because I was playing something else."
Also doesn't help: I muted the game. 
In my defense, I figured out the plot twists after one "special" double-digit ending. 


If you want something that'll creep you out and stick with you afterwards, try Doki Doki Literature Club.


Now to complain about gameplay elements in a game focused on a story:
The fact the only pause in the game is talking to someone or alt-tabbing from the game doesn't help. I'd be more patient with a game that makes you wait around if you can alt-tab and do something, like your homework if you're a college student. Furthermore, if you're going to pause the game when I alt-tab out, then stop the music. I wouldn't have turned off the music if it wasn't for that.

[spoiler] A quick disappointment + sigh of relief -> certain times to confess with or without purple hair girl doesn't change squat. [/spoiler]

Lastly, a tiny insignificant spec of dust that'll always piss me off for no reason: filling the cup with water. No real reason, but I'll make some up for you:
 - It takes too long
 - The SFX is utter trash on a stick, in audio form
 - SFX doesn't actually loop if you alt-tab from the game
 - You cannot skip it
 - Time passes by for it, but no other item interactions, like looking through the books
 - It brings down the item menu and shows you the cup getting full 
 - - so you don't think you're just urinating in cup or something? What even?
Yeah, none of those reasons are particularly real, but to me, it's like someone grabbing a piece of chalk and making a ruinous sound effect while scratching it down a chalk board. I don't get my own hatred for it. D

36604978.review:
Petit jeu assez sympa. Disons que le fait qu'il soit gratuit rend le truc valable. Si vous avez du temps à tuer, ça peut vous satisfaire.
Celles et ceux qui aiment ces jeux de relations aux fins multiples comprendront que ce jeu leur est destiné : on a tout de suite les choix et les fins qui correspondent au lieu d'affronter une longue histoire travaillée. Ca casse la dynamique habituelle mais ça ne prétend pas être une merveille donc pas de déception.
Franchement, le rythme est tellement rapide qu'au final, le casting réduit et l'absence de diversité dans les musiques (il doit y en avoir 5, à tout casser) ne se font pas tellement remarquer.
Quant à la petite séquence frayeur (assez difficile à débloquer mais logique), j'ai eu la frousse mais je suis une petite nature. 

L'histoire ne casse pas cinq pattes à un mouton mais elle est mignonne et satisfaisante malgré tout.
Bref, préparez vous à recevoir des rateaux. (Du plus simple au plus terrible en passant par le plus logiqe : "[i]Nous sommes des étudiants, il faut se concentrer sur nos études ! Je croyais que tu n'étais pas satisfait de ton dernier bulletin.[/i]" Ouille.)

本以为《告白日》只是个喜加一的小游戏，只是不经意间看到了全成就攻略，于是才再次打开了它。
在经历了各种各样的拒绝理由后，我发现男主真的是一个痴情的骑士、浪漫的男子汉，对喜欢的女孩子一次次地进行告白，就算失败，仍不气馁。这一份执着，难能可贵。
可是随着成就的一点点解开，剧情却并没有落入守得云开见月明这样的欢喜结局，而是出现了16到19这四个特殊结局，仿佛在昭示着游戏本身或许会有更深的内涵。
事实上，果然如此。
第20个成就的解锁中，随着男主和熙轨对话的进行，一切终于真相大白。当男主的魂魄最后一次站在阑珊的课桌前恋恋不舍时，我真的有些感动，原来喜欢一个人，即使明知徒劳无果，也可以为对方做许多事情；我也有一点可惜，喜欢一个人，就一定要做些事情，否则在心有余而力不足时，就只有深深的怨悔。
最后一个隐藏成就的操作完成后，再次打开游戏，出现的竟是男主和阑珊两人的图片。重新开始游戏，男主再次从课桌上醒来，来到阑珊身后，直接向她告白。
阑珊问男主叫什么名字。
[spoiler]“我叫未宇，我喜欢你。”我说。[/spoiler]

这个游戏才开始时真是卡关到心态爆炸，并不擅长揭秘推理的游戏的我完成了几个结局后只能无奈看攻略指南，遗憾的是自己未能探索出故事的真相——[spoiler]未宇车祸身亡后创造了这个自己表白总会被拒绝的意想世界 ，熙轨是一名恶魔刚好路过，想收走他的灵魂以免他成为一名恶灵，最终结局是未宇意识到了异样并和熙轨离开了……[/spoiler]
  坦白来讲游戏难度较大，但一次次的表白失败似乎更能激起对于玩家这个故事最终Truth的好奇与向往，经历了种种结局（女主黑化那次确实吓得我不轻），听了N次熟悉的失败时的伴奏音乐，最终结局确是给人最大的安慰。

   以下是一些技巧：
[list]
    [*]在不同的时间表白（并且犹豫与否）可以获得不同的成就。
    [*]一般站在地图的碎片可以收集到（共有四片，分别在第一排右数第二个（需搜索两次），阑珊后的桌子，《人间失格》中，讲桌上的资料下）
    [*]找熙轨借杯子后接水浇植物可以得到笔记本的密码，打开笔记本发现钥匙用于打开抽屉，内有小刀。
[/list]

36157862.review:
Damn

In this game we have our boy Willie trying to confess his love to her crush. Y'all be forced to be rejected over and over and over again by this heartless bitch. But as you progress and unlock more endings, the classroom will somehow add more elements to help you get a different ending each time.

That's great and all but the problem here is that the requirements here to get a different endings are too specific (like confess under 5 seconds, etc.) It's impossible to unlock all without reading a guide online. But if you surpass that trivial issue you gonna get a story that's gonna hit you.

Y'all gonna get manly tears and salute this kid. He ain't just some kid, he's OUR kid. Mad respect for Willie.

F2P的优良作品之一，所以好评，但并不怎么推荐。
优良的细节，粗糙的布局。
游戏流程是通过多次尝试告白，在一次次对话后渐渐发现隐藏在这背后的真实。
想法算是近年比较常见的一种：通过普通的日常，一点点挖掘出背后的异常，给予强烈反差对比来感染玩家。
但本作的“挖掘”节奏把握的并不那么好，前期的信息太少，后期一泼水的喷涌让人措不及防而难以有感同身受的感觉。
并如游戏作者自嘲般，“存在大量的重复和浪费时间”“直白地说不看攻略几乎无法通关”（原文），对于部分想要自力更生通关的玩家们十分不友好。（在此向完全靠自身努力通关的先驱们致敬）
不过在优质的音乐和萌萌的画风下，花点时间体验体验蛮不错的。

[spoiler]说了那么多其实都是屁话，我只在乎成就。[/spoiler]

35775795.review:
通关了，全成就达成。天呐，没想到这个免费游戏虽然这么小，但五脏俱全，结局竟然这么让人… …一言难尽。没想到我在steam的第一个评论是给这个游戏的。

一开始我确实抱着一种“哈哈我要全部自己来打通全结局！！”的想法，但完成十几个结局后已经无能为力了，因为黑化结局什么的根本不看攻略不知道，还是太naive了。我觉得瞥几眼攻略的好处是把各种琐碎的条件整合起来，然后一层层筛选来游玩的。隐藏结局有种柳暗花明又一村的感觉，[spoiler]重点就是那张游戏初始界面的cg吧~看到彩色的两人有种蜜汁感动。因为已经发生的事情并不能改变，真结局就放在那儿了… …[/spoiler]

(话说好气啊，可恶的steam！！为什么对于我一开始达成的结局并没有给我解锁成就，害得我事后又打了好几个已经通过的结局，包括在隐藏结局后重新玩了结局八，[spoiler]再回到主界面彩色cg不见了嘤嘤嘤… …[/spoiler])

[spoiler]话说女主一上来的“你谁”真的笑cry我hh太粗暴了吧这个拒绝~还有女主的“对不起我喜欢的是女孩子”太可爱了ww忍不住脑补女主和双马尾，好棒棒哦（你够）[/spoiler]

[spoiler]黑化结局觉得是作者的恶趣味。虽然我知道有黑化结局的存在，但女主和背景前后形象反差也太大了吧ww超惊悚~那个bgm的突变好吓人。[/spoiler]我觉得作者真的对bgm把握的很好啊，包括现在写评论我也是伴着游戏的开始界面音乐的，开始界面的音乐好好听啊啊。

[spoiler] 然后这个真结局… …真的让我心痛又感动。不过作者也真是简单粗暴，没有搞什么神十分感动放男主一马之类的幺蛾子，已经发生的事情再怎么进行游戏也无法改变了——有种蜜汁现实的感觉（虽然连恶魔都出来了… …）悲伤的结局永远都比幸福结局带感，我对于故事就是有这种热衷。[/spoiler]

[spoiler]最让我觉得有趣的是男主和双马尾的对话，男主的句句疑问:我是否应该告白呢、我真的配得上她吗、我到底是个怎样的人呢，分分钟体现了一个在年少时期恋爱之人内心的纠结，既纯洁又美好。恋爱真是上帝赐予的最有趣的东西呢。那些一个个奇怪的结局是不是也是男主潜意识里对于女主答复的猜想呢，总觉得可以脑补出男主在买蛋糕时的苦思冥想“她会不会是百合呢””她会不会已经有喜欢的人了呢”“她会不会沉迷学习无法自拔呢”“她会不会连我名字都不知道！”ww好可爱啊[/spoiler]

 虽然悲伤的是，如果一个人不喜欢你，他是真的不会答应你的… …除非是个碧池或者是渣男，这种人就应该下地狱。

35736550.review:
Un día vi este juego en la Store de Steam por recomendaciones, le eché un vistazo, vi buenas reviews y me lo descargué "para jugarlo algún día".
Meses más tarde le dí una oportunidad, me entretenía, pero seguía sin ver ese "algo" que hacía a este juego tan valorado. Seguí jugando y como soy obsesionado con los logros mi meta fue sacarmelos todos. Menos mal que lo hice.

En este videojuego somos un chico que quiere confesar su amor por Lizzie, una compañera de clase, pero cada vez que lo intenta es rechazado de una forma diferente, consiguiendo un final distinto. Si vas a jugar este juego TIENES que conseguir todos los finales, para así ver "el final verdadero" en donde hay un giro argumental que a mi, personalmente, me rompió el corazón. Completar este juego lleva alrdedor de 3 horas, pero valen totalmente la pena.

Visualmente es muy bello dentro de lo que un RPGMaker puede hacer, con una banda sonora que acompaña muy bien todo lo que ocurre. Algunos temas me recuerdan inclusive a "To The Moon", sobre todo la música del menú.

Me robo una frase de una review de este juego: "Confess My Love es un juego que entiende las limitaciones que tiene y las usa a su favor. Es un juego como deberian ser todos, una experiencia que puedas recordar." -CrEternals

Juegazo, y gratis! Dale una oportunidad cuanto antes. Tienes que hacerlo.

Jogo muito bom para ser gratuito!

Os puzzles são bem pensados e conseguir todos os Endings é uma tarefa difícil, porém divertida (tive que olhar o Guia para conseguir finalizar o jogo).

Quanto a jogabilidade, digo que o "caminhar" das personagens é um pouco "bugado", já que a sala está em diagonal e você só consegue andar em 4 direções. Há pequenos bugs na pontuação do texto também (aparecem quadrados no lugar de pontos de interrogação, exclamação, etc).

Há BUG também no sistema de conquistas. Eu terminei o jogo, mas não consegui 1 conquista sequer. Se pretende jogar o jogo pelas conquistas, recomendo mudar de ideia.

EDIT: O bug das conquistas pode ser resolvido ao fechar e abrir a Steam e reinstalar o jogo.

这款游戏其实拖了很久没有完成，其实游戏本身并不长，大概最多两个小时就可以通关。一款很精致小巧的游戏，随着游戏不断解锁出新的成就，也会得到新的线索和道具。每一次男主被拒绝的理由，都很有趣，总给人一种“你说的好有道理，我竟然没有办法反驳”的感觉，这点可以说是很用心了。
游戏的故事线是随着周目的不断深入才不断挖掘出来的，要承认的是，玩到最后，男主送出最后的蛋糕的时候，还是会觉得一时间有些唏嘘。
玩到全部成就解锁，是有一些地方没搞明白，比如为什么班长的日记本里会有柜子的钥匙，比如在书柜里的那三本书有什么含义？不过也有可能是关卡需要，而我太纠结了吧2333，总的来说是一款很不错的游戏，推荐！

35364098.review:
I loved this game it took me a while to do all 20 endings and 21 for you secret achievement hunters. The entirety of the game takes place in the classroom you sit at the back of the class but ever so patiently admiring the girl you love so much. This is a tale of how you(Willie) wants to find a way to confess to Liza who is a star student in the class. But whats this?.. fragments of an evil presence reside here in the classroom? or... is something preventing you from remembering? All will be answered if you take the time to play through the game "carefully"! You cannot save the game manually however after each part you do the game will automatically save. so do not worry! 

[spoiler] How I wish there was a good ending... or atleast! a ending that we could have had closure with. Something like Liza finds out, actually loved him too? and attends his funeral. OR even better.. Willie doesn't die but is in a coma in the hospital, he still blocks out what events transpired but because of the devil just as she's trying to take Willie away Willie hears a voice (it's Liza calling out to him from the hospital room) and he instead turns to run toward the source and is brought back? Then you could have Julie smirk and say "So... you're one of the lucky few? hmph!" and she walks away through the door. I feel like this would've been a better true ending.	[/spoiler]

35224582.review:
Confess My Love - игра, где нужно решить, проблему Вилли, с тем как найти подход, к сердцу его одноклассницы Лизы и признаться ей в любви, да так, чтобы не получить отказ. Действие классная комната школы, сразу так подойти к Лизе и признаться, хоть и выйдет, но отошьет она по полной. Каждый отказ дает, флажок "неудачи", который будет красоваться, скажем, на доске объявлений в классе. Игра на английском языке, но из-за частых отказов и повтора действий, диалоги и названия предметов, не меняются.
Игра бесплатная, но довольно интересная, в ней 20 концовок, 19 из них со строгим приговором для Вилли и разбитым сердец.

35193560.review: Confess My Love at first seems to be a simple story about a boy confessing to a girl he likes (and getting horribly rejected every time), but it's also a rather tragic tale about regret and letting go. Though many of the twenty endings are tedious and/or unintuitive to get, and the translation can be slightly rocky at times (though it seems it used to be much rockier), if you play as many endings as you can find and then use a walkthrough, this bittersweet little game is definitely worth your time, especially for the low, low price of $0. I also intend to use this game as an explanation for why I will never confess feelings for anyone ever.

35104573.review:
[h1]Confess My Love - Wyznaj Moją Miłość[/h1]
Czy może stać się rzeczywistością, by koleżanka z Twojej klasy, w której się podkochujesz, otworzyła dla Ciebie swoje serce i chciałaby się stać Twoją dziewczyną? Wszystko zależy od Ciebie - a raczej od tego, czy masz ochotę to sprawdzić! A to już zależy od Ciebie, chociaż moim zdaniem... warto.

[h1]Wstęp[/h1]
Jesteśmy Willie - zakochanym w Lizie chłopakiem... uczęszczającym do szkoły wyższej! Jego zadaniem jest wyznać studentce miłość, co jednak do prostych zadań nie należy, bo jak wiadomo, nie wszystkim słowa mają ochotę przejść przez gardło. A jeszcze naszym utrapieniem jest Julie, która nie ma zamiaru wyjść w ogóle z klasy! Naszym zadaniem jest przeprowadzić go przez próby dokonania tego, nie zapominając o tykającym w lewym górnym rogu zegarze, od którego zależy cały przebieg rozgrywki. Jedna może trwać maksymalnie 5 minut, dlatego istnieje możliwość przechodzenia jej krok po kroku.

[h1]Jednak przyzwyczajcie się do bycia odrzuconym...[/h1]
...ponieważ endorfiny często działają jednokierunkowo. Każdy powód może być inny, zależnie od czasu, a także i od tego, czy fioletowowłosa dziewczyna jest obecnie w pomieszczeniu. To jedna z tych rzeczy, które jednak wywołują na graczu poczucie empatii z głównym bohaterem, co jest głównym aspektem psychologicznym.

[h1]Czy warto?[/h1]
Pierwszym argumentem "za" uznam to, że gra jest darmowa, zaś drugim - iż oferuje wiele zakończeń. Za dodatkowy plus należy uznać ten ostateczny ending, ponieważ to on odgrywa główną rolę w "Confess My Love", a nie spodziewałabym się takiego zwrotu akcji. Soundtrack na porządnym poziomie, więc każdy, kto się w nim zakochał, może wyszukać go w folderze aplikacji. Grafika, mimo iż wygląda prosto, potrafi zauroczyć. Niestety rzucę jednym minusem - gra potrafi zanudzić bez poradnika. O ile należy się nagłówkować, to i tak niektóre rzeczy same nie przyjdą.

[h1]Short summary[/h1]
Plusy:
+ Darmowa
+ Wiele zakończeń sytuacji, które zależą od czasu i innych aspektów
+ Główny ending - cudo
+ Niezły soundtrack
+ Prosta, urocza, pikselkowa grafika

Minusy:
- Po jakimś czasie potrafi zanudzić
- Bez poradnika wiele nie zdziałasz

Not a bad game, but not a great game. To get the "true" ending, you have to get all 19 of the other endings, which is kind of tedious! Also, I would not recommend trying to get all the endings without a guide. The true ending *is* pretty clever, but I probably would have enjoyed this game more without so many endings and so much repetition.

EDIT: Honestly, removing some of the more tedious endings and finding a way to access a certain room without having to repeat a particular lengthy sequence each time probably would make this game enjoyable enough to warrant something like a $0.99 or $1.99 price tag. As it is, I can't recommend it, even though it's free!

This was a lot of sitting around and repetition for not much pay-off. However, I think a few simple changes would have helped:

- the books in the bookcase could have been readable 
- some extra items to look at (although I guess these might have functioned as red herrings)
- fewer endings by cutting down on many of the boring ones

Perhaps I'm not patient enough. I certainly like the premise. I wouldn't say this is a terrible game, simply one I can't in all fairness recommend. I'm surprised by how many thumbs up this has. While I'm not saying it doesn't deserve any praise, I'm confused as to why it is not more mixed. Hopefully, people are being honest and enjoying it, and not posting joke reviews. 

Because this is free, it seems cruel to give it a negative review. I like to be honest, though, even for free games. These are easy achievements for Steam, especially if you follow the Guide. So there's that.

34600933.review:
首先这是个萌系的游戏（废话）
但是这个萌系的游戏你越玩到后面越会感到诡异，心脏不好的人千万不要在半夜玩（别问我是怎么知道的）
不过真的感觉女主好萌，游戏内的立绘比开始界面的还好，感觉跟男主绝对不是一个次元的存在（这难道是对后面的伏笔？）
还有这是个多周目的游戏，一周目的游戏是时间最多就几分钟，可以做为一个休闲游戏抽空玩完。
解密因素不怎么强，主要还是看剧情，游戏的主要特色也主要是玩法和想法的特殊，而且玩这个玩到最后会感到有点惊喜，不得不佩服作者的脑洞，在这里我就不剧透了。
对于还没有玩过这个游戏的人，建议去看看攻略，因为这种游戏毕竟还是主要以剧情为卖点，攻略里的剧透也不是很严重，当然如果你希望自己探索的话我给几个提示：
1、要注意左上角的小圆圈，里面的数字代表着是你这一周目所消耗的时间，其中大部分的结局都和这个有关。
2、当你玩出几个结局后会发现教室内会多出一些东西，这些东西开始还是不要纠结，要等你玩出多个结局后，等东西都出现了才有用。
3、地图左上方有个黑板，当你玩成一个新结局后会有旗子出现在黑板上，可以从旗子的位置和数字上看出还剩下哪些结局。
对于玩完这个游戏的人可能会意识到女二玩第二周目的时候才会出现也是个伏笔，联系最后的结局来看不得不说算是一个有趣的细节。
抱着想学习告白技巧来玩这个游戏的还是放弃了吧，这个游戏没有讲述告白后的温柔，只有残酷，但也不是说男主的告白技巧有问题，其实只要有了一定感情基础，告白还是很容易成功的。

34594043.review:
A game that I assure you will surpass your expectations and take you on a wild ride of emotions. Including frustration at times. I downloaded this as a means of passing half an hour before bed. I ended up playing the game non stop for 4 hours and refused to leave my chair until I 100% it. 

Gameplay:

The gameplay knows what it is, simplistic, and works well within those confineds. Giving you challenges to work against that, like the gameplay mechanics, are simple, yet offer enough of a challenge to warrant multiple retries without rage mode getting to hard to destroy your keyboard. But, I could certainly see someone getting a little too agro. So if you know you're easily wound up you might wanna take a lot of breaks playing this game. 

Music:

There aren't a lot of sound tracks or SFX in the game but the ones that are there are decent enough to not drive one insane. However, they're nothing to write home about. 

Art:

The pixel art itself is astonishing but the character sprites when entering more, VN style, conversation (which is every conversation) is also lack lustier. Lack lustier but not so awful you can't stand to look at it.

Story:

Without spoiling the story isn't anything super original but it's execution is what makes it. It feels like there is no story to speak of at first. But, stick with it. 


Overall. This game is a great way to spend (not waste) around 2 hours (if you're good) or 4 hours (if you're me level bad). I really enjoyed my time with this game and if you're a weeb of culture you will too (you don't have to be a weeb to play this game, it's by no means a weeb game). It reminds me of Corpse Party in many ways. Try to go into this game blind. You'll thank yourself for it.

Cute game. It only took me 84 minutes to 100% it so don't expect a huge amount of content.

Pros:

- Cute story
- Amusing dialogue
- Unexpected twists 
- Totally unexpected ending/endings with a nice message

Cons:

- Bad controls 
- Repetitive
- Involves literally sitting there waiting for a clock to count up over several minutes for a few endings, inability to skip this is frustrating
- Basically impossible to do without a guide 

I found this game fun enough to thumbs up and it's free so one can hardly complain. Overlook the flaws and play it for the story and the fun twists. 

Although I can't help but wonder [spoiler] why the hell he went with the devil who had come to claim his soul? D: I mean seriously, did he not think to ask if there was a better option than that, it didn't seem like it would be a particularly pleasant afterlife. [/spoiler]

34437946.review:
结局1《忽视》        ：在5秒-1分钟中内（左侧时间显示为0）直接进行表白。

  结局2《听不见》    ：在1分钟-2分钟内（左侧时间显示为1）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。

  结局3《中断》       ：在1分钟-2分钟内（左侧时间显示为1）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。  

  结局4《占星理论》：在2分钟-3分钟内（左侧时间显示为2）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。

  结局5《朋友》       ：在2分钟-3分钟内（左侧时间显示为2）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。

  结局6《标准结局》：在3分钟-4分钟内（左侧时间显示为3）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。

  结局7《……》        ：在3分钟-4分钟内（左侧时间显示为3）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。

  结局8《好好学习》：在4分钟-5分钟内（左侧时间显示为4）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。

  结局9《取向》       ：在4分钟-5分钟内（左侧时间显示为4）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。

  结局10《失败》      ：进入游戏后什么都不用做等待五分钟后阑珊和熙轨自行离开即可。

  结局11《放弃》      ：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。与前桌的熙轨对话，以蛋糕为条件劝她离开。然后等待左侧计时显示为5后，阑珊自行离开。

  结局12《准备不足》：进入游戏后，立即冲向阑珊（按住shift可以加速移动），在五秒内进行表白即可。

  选择结局（13-15）：与时间无关，根据操作不同而走向不同结局

  结局13《做不到》：进入游戏后直接从前门离开即可。

  结局14《婉拒》：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。向阑珊表白，并依次选择“给她蛋糕”、“喜欢你”。（若第一个选项选择“直接表白”则与时间结局相同）

  结局15《误解》：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。向阑珊表白，并依次选择“给她蛋糕”、“……”。（若第一个选项选择“直接表白”则与时间结局相同）

 隐藏成就：

  关闭游戏，右键属性→本地文件→浏览本地文件→system文件夹→将System.rvdata2文件删除或重命名。重启游戏，即可解锁最后一个成就。

34411562.review:
自己探索+看攻略不到2小时通关之后跑过来写了个感想
游戏还是推荐的，多周目的游戏要素比较有新意，因为每周目的游戏时间比较短所以剧情重复的缺点不是特别突出，不如说重复的多周目剧情反而是游戏真正剧情的一部分，精致的像素画面（嗯……）也让玩家有继续推进剧情的动力，可以说2个小时左右的游戏长度刚刚好，后日谈给人一种“其实这个是另一个游戏的预告片”的感觉，期待制作组的下一部作品

对于一些差评里的“游戏剧情重复是制作组能力不足/不上心”的评语，我是不太同意的，制作组对于游戏剧情应该是有用心琢磨过的，最大的论据就是[spoiler][b]在你完成每一个end之后和熙轨对话，对话内容都会有所不同[/b]，再联想一下熙轨这个角色的真实身份（路过的恶魔/记忆空间中唯一一个不被记忆重置的存在）和阑珊的存在状态（以“被告白”为存在目的的幻象）就很容易理解为何会有如此“重复”的剧情了。[/spoiler]当然作者自己也说了，这种设计有一定程度上的故意为之，所以我就姑且把自己的想法当做正解了w

对了说句题外话，这游戏如果不看攻略玩的话基本看不到隐藏剧情，而刨去隐藏剧情这就是个真·无聊小游戏了……作者这种“以看攻略为前提”的设计思路究竟是好还是不好呢……我也不太好随意评判啊……

[b]以下是个人废话时间（剧透预警）[/b]
[spoiler]其实我本来以为这就是个普通的小游戏（信了“失恋模拟器”的鬼话），但是玩到后面感觉……很有海囚的既视感……
比如路过的恶魔什么的，大半段意识流的剧情什么的，震你一下的桥段什么的，突如其来的追逐战什么的……
当然了海囚式的超大超空旷地图和净TM扯淡的NPC是没有的（对海囚的迷之印象）
但是！看到通关之后的后日谈突然感觉一部新时代的灰色庭园呼之欲出啊有没有！！！
结果你们制作组就这样告诉我“全部剧情就是这样我们跑路了大家有缘再见”！？
不要啊dalao！球球李继续做下去好不好啊！我给你们钱还不行吗！
咳咳总之这只是一个玩不到海囚新作的海囚粉的怨念……大家可以忽视上边的话……
算了不多说了过几天我把这制作组的续（遗？）作也买来玩玩……[/spoiler]
————————————————————————————————————

34269233.review:
表白不是集结号，也不是发起冲锋的号角，而是胜利时才奏响的乐章。

一款有点意思的小游戏。剧情说不上新颖，但对于没有接受过同类型剧情的玩家还是颇为受用。地图是倾斜的，操作手感不佳，解谜过程连蒙带猜，没有太大的联系。在结局打到大概一半时，便已能猜到结局。我的游戏流程大概是：频繁被拒，发现碎片和结局数目挂钩，发现结局和表白时机选项挂钩，开变速齿轮快速搞定11个结局，解谜推理然后选择错误时间点表白，看攻略，按照攻略完成16-19结局，对照攻略完成之前漏掉的结局。

另外，不看攻略不可能打出全成就。

[spoiler]评分：3/10[/spoiler]

34223628.review:
Masz wolne 2 godziny i brak pomysłu na spędzenie tego czasu? Lubisz nowe, ciekawe koncepcje? Nie potrzebujesz strzelanek oraz grafiki z najwyższej półki, żeby dobrze się bawić? 
Nie musisz szukać dalej!

Oto krótka gra, która pokazuje, że nie trzeba dużego budżetu, żeby wciągnąć, wzruszyć i pozostać na długo w pamięci. 
Fabuła na pierwszy rzut oka może wydawać się prosta - jako główny bohater, starasz się wyznać miłość koleżance z klasy. Dość nieskutecznie, trzeba by dodać ;) Ale prawdziwego mężczyznę można poznać po tym, że nigdy się nie poddaje! Kolejne próby odkrywają nowe możliwości i nowe zakończenia, a przede wszystkim prawdę ukrytą pod postacią tego dziwnego pomieszczenia. 
Mechanika gry jest prosta - połączenie gry randkowej z escape roomem, gracz znajduje i łączy pewne elementy, żeby uzyskać pożądany efekt. Gra oferuje 20 zakończeń, każda z prób trwa max 5 minut. Niektóre z nich mogą stwarzać problemy, ale warto się nie poddawać i trochę pogłówkować (lub wygooglować poradnik), ponieważ ostateczne zakończenie wynagrodzi wszelkie trudy. Tak, to jest ten typ gry, w którą się gra do końca albo nie gra wcale :) 
Wszystkiemu zaś dodaje uroku bardzo przyjemny soundtrack. 

Gra jest darmowa, jak najbardziej więc polecam.

34093539.review:
游戏结局汇总
游戏共20个结局，分别对应20个成就，外加一个隐藏成就，共21个。
20个结局分为15个普通结局、4个特殊结局、1个真实结局。已解锁结局可以在教室上方的公告板或者Steam成就查看。
普通结局分为12个时间结局和3个选择结局
时间结局（1-12）：根据表白时间的不同而导向的不同结局
时间在游戏窗口左侧以数字方式显示。游戏在切换窗口后仍然播放BGM但不再计时，因此以下所提到的时间均需保持窗口在最前。
结局1《忽视》 ：在5秒-1分钟中内（左侧时间显示为0）直接进行表白。
结局2《听不见》 ：在1分钟-2分钟内（左侧时间显示为1）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。
结局3《中断》 ：在1分钟-2分钟内（左侧时间显示为1）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。
结局4《占星理论》：在2分钟-3分钟内（左侧时间显示为2）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。
结局5《朋友》 ：在2分钟-3分钟内（左侧时间显示为2）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。
结局6《标准结局》：在3分钟-4分钟内（左侧时间显示为3）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。
结局7《……》 ：在3分钟-4分钟内（左侧时间显示为3）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。
结局8《好好学习》：在4分钟-5分钟内（左侧时间显示为4）进行表白，并选择“犹豫”。
结局9《取向》 ：在4分钟-5分钟内（左侧时间显示为4）进行表白，并选择“直接告白”。
结局10《失败》 ：进入游戏后什么都不用做等待五分钟后阑珊和熙轨自行离开即可。
结局11《放弃》 ：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。与前桌的熙轨对话，以蛋糕为条件劝她离开。然后等待左侧计时显示为5后，阑珊自行离开。
结局12《准备不足》：进入游戏后，立即冲向阑珊（按住shift可以加速移动），在五秒内进行表白即可。
选择结局（13-15）：与时间无关，根据操作不同而走向不同结局
结局13《做不到》：进入游戏后直接从前门离开即可。
结局14《婉拒》：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。向阑珊表白，并依次选择“给她蛋糕”、“喜欢你”。（若第一个选项选择“直接表白”则与时间结局相同）
结局15《误解》：进入游戏后，从下方调查自己的课桌，得到“日记本”和“盒装蛋糕”。向阑珊表白，并依次选择“给她蛋糕”、“……”。（若第一个选项选择“直接表白”则与时间结局相同）
特殊结局（16-19）：分为两组，16和17、18和19.同组结局需要分两次得到.进入此部分后主菜单阑珊消失。
随着越来越多的结局解锁，会发现教室中有闪光的碎片。当解锁到11个结局及以上时，可以在分别在教室最右侧的柜子调查《人间失格》、讲台上的操作指南、第一排右二课桌（需两次调查）、阑珊身后的课桌发现四块碎片。（调查闪光时请站在闪光下方调查而非站在闪光上，如调查课桌时应站在课桌桌洞方向面向黑板）
结局16、17组：进入16、17结局，首先需要完成以下步骤：
第一部分：（前四步完成顺序可随意打乱）
①收集上述四个碎片②找熙轨对话借她的水杯（也可以支走她后直接拿），并用水杯在教室最上的饮水机打水，然后调查旁边的植物给它浇水得到密码（密码每次不同）。③调查最后一排的班长记事本，放入碎片并输入密码得到钥匙，用钥匙打开教室右侧柜子的抽屉，得到小刀。④关上两个窗帘并用蛋糕支走熙轨⑤等到左侧时间显示为3时向阑珊表白，达成结局7。完成，回到主菜单，下次开始即有几率进入黑化房间。
第二部分：
在主菜单，选择【开始】，
我们可以直接在这里看到熙轨是否在座位上，如果在，请直接点击右上角红叉关闭游戏，然后重新打开，否则你必须重新完成第一部分的步骤。如果不在，那么恭喜你已顺利进入16、17组的黑化房间。（因为通常需要多次开关游戏，所以建议先将STEAM好友状态设为离线，否则恐怕好友-N）。进入房间后，与阑珊对话，发现她已经“黑化”，你需要从教室的前门逃脱，逃脱成功即为结局16《逃脱》，失败被捉即为结局17《噩梦》。（如果你想完成结局16但是被抓，也请在被抓后立即关闭游戏然后重启游戏直到重新进入本黑化房间，否则，你必须完成下一组结局后再重新完成以上全部步骤后才能再次进入。）
结局18、19组：
完成结局16/17后下一周目必定进入，进入游戏后，操作同第一部分步骤的1-3步。从柜子里拿到小刀后剧情自动播放进入结局18《有猫饼》，若在先用蛋糕支走熙轨，再去拿小刀，则进入结局19《伤》。
最终结局（20）：故事的真相
解锁了其余全部结局后才能进入本结局。你可以在教室上方的公告板看到你已解锁了19个结局，调查公告板，然后与熙轨对话即可。（完成本结局后，主菜单的男主也消失了。至此，所有结局成就已经解锁。）
结束后，回到主菜单，继续点击【开始】可以熙轨与前辈在教室内的对话。同前辈一起离开后，再次回到主菜单点击开始，即显示“空间不存在，初始化失败”，游戏自动关闭。
隐藏成就：
关闭游戏，右键属性→本地文件→浏览本地文件→system文件夹→将System.rvdata2文件删除或重命名。重启游戏，即可解锁最后一个成就。

34080711.review:
第一次写评测，激动。。。。。
最后花了3.7小时拿到了全成就，诚然这是一款只要花时间体会就能有所感触的精品RPG小游戏
BGM很赞，很有氛围，尤其是在通关后再听到封面音乐，感触颇深。3个角色（算上格律四个），一个教室。简单的人设，和告白剧情最后能为玩家讲述这么一个有头有尾恋爱悲剧故事。不得不佩服作者对于剧情掌控上的功力。多结局的设定让我一下子就想到了尼尔。（最后拿到真结局果然被删档了，不过好游戏就应该是这样，即使档没了依然能令玩家流连好久）
唯一觉得不足的地方，就是作为一个解密性质的游戏，引导做得还不够。长时间的重复剧情，对于玩家的意志也是一种考验，很容易让玩家半路放弃。本来我也想自己慢慢玩，但苦撑两小时后。。。还是选择看攻略。说句实话有些结局的条件不看攻略不是一两个小时就能摸索出来的

34026590.review:
[h1]Er... sério que esse jogo tá cheio de análise positiva?[/h1]

Um jogo com uma narrativa e objetivos simples. Você é um menino no colégio que, como o próprio nome diz, quer confessar o seu amor para uma colega de sala que não faz ideia de quem você seja. A narrativa apela a um público que se vê na mesma situação do personagem, claro. 
Cada forma de confessar (ou fracassar ao) seu amor pela menina não dura mais de cinco minutos, e cada final habilita outros finais, ou outras formas de se confessar para a garota. O problema é que o jogo não te informa muito sobre essa progressão, e se você tiver o mínimo de curiosidade vai acabar encontrando partes que são inúteis até você ter completado outros finais e ter avançado um pouquinho mais na narrativa. É um joguinho simples, que provavelmente saiu do RPG Maker e se afastou do gênero clássico de J-RPG (que sempre acompanha o RPG Maker).

A narrativa, no entanto, é extremamente simples. Os diálogos são vazios e não acrescentam informação alguma para a progressão da história. Os pequenos puzzles são ridiculamente fáceis e você deve seguir um walkthrough pra passar de certa parte do jogo, [spoiler]que consiste em realizar uma série de ações que mais parecem um combo pra glitchar o jogo[/spoiler].  O plot-twist desse jogo é manjadíssimo, digno de ver em um filme e dizer que "isso estragou o filme".

O jogo é um passatempo pouco divertido, que vai te irritar se você não seguir um guia da comunidade, porque há poucos marcadores de progressão. Minha mãe dizia que "de graça até injeção no olho", então você consegue tirar 21 conquistas por zero centavos. Mas diversão você provavelmente não vai ter, a não ser que se veja numa situação parecida a do personagem.

33869834.review:
Wow. So I took about 50 minutes, mainly bc of me getting the extra room multiple times while I tried to get the other endings before getting the final one, and I will say that for the kind of game and the time it takes to get each of the 20 (Yes 20 endings), it is totally worth the time I put into it! 

First and foremost let me show the rating in a more "simplistic" view.

(Scores will be to 5 since I suck at 10 ratings XD)

 - Story- 4/5- Although this game was something I just played because I saw it was about a boy in love trying to confess his love, I played it expecting it to have at most 5 endings. I found out each achievement means a different ending and the fact of how each ending seems to tie into each other a tad bit more as you piece together the true ending to the rest surprised me. You will see why it doesnt have a higher score in the next genre(?).

 - Music- 5/5- The only reason that this got a 6 is because it doesn't fit the style of the game. It actually surpasses the game itself since it is calming when it needs to be and unnerving or unsettling when you reach the alternate room. You, game dev and music dev, picked the perfect songs for the Nightmare room. It is actually too fitting for the area as I felt like I NEEDED to get out! Although I praised the story so highly, none of the feeling from the nightmare room would have been as impactful as it would have been without the music.

 - Controls- 3/5- This got a 3 because I am including the hitboxes of all the interactions. The desks and door as well as the curtains and plant/watercooler were difficult at first to find out the first few turns I had to interact with them. This didn't bother me enough to give it a 3 solely because of that. The controls are a part to do with it too. In the beginning, when you first start, you get a glimpse of what the controls are and that is fine but I think I was expecting the game to be a little less sensitive on these controls because of the type of game it is.

 - Dialogue/Grammar- 4/5- Although the english is very bad, it is something you can use context clues to read and you can always just read it a bit longer than needed if it is that bad. I never had that issue but I will say it was a tad hard to understand at times. This is why it is a 4 and not any lower of a score.

33756850.review:
Interesting game. There are a total of 20 endings, the first 15 are pretty easy to get, just most of them are time based. To get endings 16-20 will almost certainly require a guide, or some trial and error if you're a masochist. 

The game is pretty funny at first, then you'll start to wonder just what is really going on the more you play. The true ending isn't quite as much of a tear jerker as the reviews tend to make you think it is though. That being said, it did make me feel bad regardless.

Considering the game is free, go ahead and pick it up. Getting all of the endings is fun, though just pick up a guide and follow it as soon as you start to wonder just what to do next to save yourself the hassle.

33743992.review:
【提示：可能有剧透】
【提示：可能有剧透】
【提示：可能有剧透】
很少玩这样类型的剧情类的游戏，这让我有点想起以前玩的橙光游戏 。
一开始尝试自己探索，看到男主被女主以各种各样不同的方式被拒绝，第一个反应是扑哧笑了出来。
但是笑过之后想想，有些情景就发生在自己身上，只能苦笑，想起自己表白被拒绝之后那种失望的心情。
玩了一个小时差不多发现卡关了，只能上网找攻略。毕竟我不是很擅长这种游戏。
照着攻略玩下去发现这个小小的游戏里面还是有很多隐藏的要素的。例如16和17结局，bgm的渲染，颜色变深，然后女主的黑化，的确是给了我有些惊悚的感觉。但是玩完游戏回来想，不知道这两个结局到底意味这什么。有可能是爱一个人爱的太深走火入魔了？女主成为了男主的心魔，最终把男主吞噬的感觉？
看到最后的最后，知道了整件事情的真相后，挺为男主惋惜的（游戏设定这也是没办法的╮（╯＿╰）╭）。
但是回到自己现实身上来想，我们比男主幸福，我们还活着，我们还有时间和机会去想自己喜欢的人说一声“我喜欢你”
这大概就是这个游戏给我们的一个友好的提醒把。不要等没有机会见到那个TA（比如不在同一个学校读书了等等）对TA表白才后悔
所以这是个很好的游戏，强力推荐，而且能很快通关。如果你看到这里，并且打算玩这款游戏的话，我的建议是不同的结局尽量自己来探索，这是这个游戏最大的亮点了。

33712539.review:
非常出众的一款游戏，33周目总算全成就了，当然看了下攻略，不然可能需要更久吧
结局：总共20个结局，前面的结局基本都和时间挂钩，一开始不注意作者设计的时间元素的话就很伤
剧情：这个就写在结局后了，其实能称为剧情的也就18/19和20这三个结局吧，感触最深的是19和20。结局19：自以为是的保护，其实却是血淋淋的伤害。玩到这个结局时这句话给我的感触很深，世间大多事都是如此，而情之一道更甚，这样的话不是第一次听，但33周目的游戏下来，却莫名感触了一下。然后是20的最终结局，整个剧情围绕一间教室，不过是主角的精神世界执念存留，这让我莫名想到了凉宫以及《Deemo》。
设计：或许整体设计很简洁，但却让人玩得下去，在如今各类大作繁杂的今天，能玩一玩这种游戏是很不错的，如果说可以选择将这款游戏更复杂些的话，那我选择放弃这种复杂化
评分：免费，可玩性高   9/10     少一分角色移动生硬和BGM不足吧

33702304.review:
This is one of those games where you have to fail multiple times to get all the endings, plus the good ending. It gets monotonous real quickly, especially when there's no hints in it, and you have to do a lot of guesswork or look up a walkthrough. The game also doesn't really deserve its horror tag, as there's not enough horror content in it to justify the tag.

There IS a surprise twist to the story, but it takes a lot of jumping through hoops, trial, and error to get it. The translation from Japanese to English also fails in many places, and while it's the most entertaining thing about this game, sadly, it doesn't save it from all its cons.

It's a shame, because the ending IS good, but having to repeat a lot of endings and steps just to get the true one just isn't fun, and doesn't make it worthwhile.

本人花了近一个半个钟来摸索剧情以及解密要素，最后是在是智商不够用就看了攻略，但这依旧花了我不少时间...
游戏作为国产独立免费的，我还是觉得哪怕卖个三四十块都觉得血赚，原因如下：
1、剧情紧凑，不到5分钟就能完成一周目（部分结局需要5分钟）
2、剧情、结局多样化（男主花式被拒）
3、在打16、17结局的时候差点没把我吓死，bgm和教室的画风突变都特别新颖
4、结局20（最终结局）比较感人吧（本人体会），回味许久
5、第21个成就纯属坑人...
不管怎么说，作为一个一下午就能摸通的独立游戏，重重推介！

33686336.review:
Esse game foi tão.. Triste.
Baixei achando que seria um simples jogo de romance, e quando abri o game, não consegui mais parar de jogar até chegar ao fim.
O game inteiro se passa em apenas um cenário, a sala de aula de Willie, que tenta arrumar uma forma de confessar seu amor à Liza. O game tem vários "finais", sendo que no ultimo final tudo vai ser bem explicado.
Confesso que em muitas partes do game eu me identifiquei com Willie, parecia que eu estava me enxergando no lugar dele (Só me ferro nessa vida), mas depois eu quase chorei ao saber a verdade, e o game até te dá um "Acorda" pra refletir sobre a vida..

Recomendo.

玩完游戏简直感慨万分，游戏里的那么画面，其实也真正对应了所有告白者的心意。
一次一次地想象自己被如何拒绝，让自己越来越不敢去面对表白这件事情，到最后，人走茶凉。
所以，珍惜眼前，即使你可能依旧会被拒绝，但如果你不行动，那份炽热的心意永远停留于你的脑中。
但是我依旧还是受不了那诡异的走位-------------------（剧透）---
[spoiler]通关过游戏的大概会知道，男主就算鼓起了那么多次的勇气，但是结果却依旧不堪设想，唯独剩下手中为她买的蛋糕，静静遗留在了她的桌上，便悄然离去了。
然而我实在是受不了好不容易有些感动看到男主化成了灵魂却依旧诡异地有脚步声，并且横！着！走！ [/spoiler]
好处大家肯定能够看的到了，各种高玩已经差不多补全了，说说我这个低配的意见。
1.游戏真的难
对于那些不怎么玩这种风格的真的难，我都是靠着一大堆攻略才爬到ending的，表示真心难 (；′⌒`) 
2.操作就不吐槽了，哎
诶！？没啦？
=￣ω￣=这游戏真不错呐
推荐

O jogo tem uma história bacana, mas pode cansar rapidamente o jogador.

33602238.review:
Great game for those who want to finish a game in less than two hours. This is one of those games where spoiling the game for yourself ruins the experience since the entire game. So, I wouldn’t look at any more reviews if you haven’t finished the game already.

The game has a very strong narrative to it and presents itself in a well-organized manner to the player. Although, getting endings 16 and up requires an event flag that I had to look up a guide for since it requires a very specific chain of actions to raise. Probably because endings 16 and up require you to be 16 and up to not have nightmares after seeing that thing. Yeah, there’s a good reason why one of the popular tags for this game is “horror.”

The only thing left I must say about this game is play through all 20 endings unspoiled. It will be worth it in the end. It certainly left an emotional impact on me.

33530265.review:
A trama toda ocorre em torno de Willie, que está apaixonado por Liza. No entanto, por ser muito tímido ele nunca falou ou demonstrou seus sentimentos antes, isso até este momento!
Com duração máxima de 5 minutos (cada vez que você joga), "Confess my Love" se mostra desafiador ao dispor 20 finais diferentes para essa simples (não tanto para alguns) tarefa, o que poderá garantir algumas horas de jogo na tentativa de desvandar seu maior mistério! O único ponto que deixa a desejar é sua tradução para o portugês onde podemos ver alguns problemas no reconhecimento de caracteres além dos textos se localizando fora dos limites da caixa. A movimentação do personagem é difícil de começo no entanto assim que se acostumar esse não será mais um grande problema. Tirando esses dois pormenores, o jogo é graficamente agradável e sua trama promete manter os jogadores entretidfos por um bom tempo.

33485833.review:
[h1] Confess my Love, un juego corto pero muy especial. [/h1]

Confess My Love, es un juego… Difícil de describir, se trata de la historia de Willie un chico tímido y con problemas para relacionarse que trata de confesarle su amor a Liza, una chica destacada en las clases.

-Todo esto suena como una trama muy simple y hasta cliché ¿no?

-Pues sí, pero déjame decirte que es más que solo esto.

En el juego debemos tomar el papel de Willie y confesarle nuestro amor a Liza, aunque esto no siempre saldrá bien [spoiler] (casi nunca XD), [/spoiler] mientras sigamos progresando el juego cambiará sutil mente, esto continuará hasta que consigamos los 20 finales y la historia finalice, lo realmente especial del juego son esos finales, cada uno de ellos es mejor que el anterior, algunos son tristes, otros son graciosos y otros simplemente te dejaran dándole vueltas a la cabeza.

-¿Entonces recomendarías este juego?

[b] -Absolutamente, ¡No puedes perderte la oportunidad de jugarlo! [/b]

[h1] Puntos Positivos. [/h1]	

[list]
[*] Una historia única, tendrías que jugarlo para entenderlo.
[*] Grandiosos personajes.
[*] Un buen soundtrack
[*] 20 finales que harán pensar para conseguir cada uno de ellos.
[*] Una conclusión que alterará tus emociones.
[*] ¡Cerca de 3 horas de entretenimiento!
[*] ¡Es totalmente gratis!
[*] ¡Solo pesa 37 megas!
[/list]

[h1] Puntos Negativos. [/h1]

[list]
[*] Algunos finales son muy similares, y su manera de obtención también es muy similar a otras.
[/list]

[h1] Conclusión. [/h1]

En conclusión Confess My Love es un grandioso RPG, sin embargo no es el mejor, pero eso no significa que no merezca la pena. Confess My Love cuenta con una historia como ninguna otra, que hará que tus emociones se disparen, aun siendo el más macho, yendo al punto tendrías que completar el juego para entender su encanto, definitivamente no puedes perderte este maravilloso juego, ¡¿Qué estas esperando?! ¡No tienes excusa para no jugarlo! ¡Es totalmente gratis!

[b] 8.9/10 [/b]

33472781.review:
Confess My Love is a Free-to-Play RPG created by LR Studio. You play as a boy named Willie who wakes up in class seeing both his highschool crush and another classmate left in the room. The premise of the game is to interact with the objects and characters in the room to unlock different endings.

Prositive
- Multiple endings
- Simple yet appealing artstlye
- Simple plot that goes deeper depending on the endings you unlock.

Negative
- May get repetitive after awhile interacting with same objects over and over again just to unlock a different ending.
- You may need to consult walthrough to unlock all endings

33472171.review:
A surprisingly interesting multiple run love game with a good story.

The game isn't terribly long, although it can become repetitive due to its nature of multiple runs.

Athough I did throughly enjoy my time playing this game, some of the endings however are unreasonably difficult to get. You most likely will not be able to get all the endings without a guide, and if not then you must have amazing patience.
If you're like me some endings might hit a little too close to home, so do keep that in mind.

I loved the darker parts of the game, which came as quite a surprise to me as I was expecting a cute romance game. This game is not that. The protagonist is very unsuccessful in this game.

The ending is sad but very appropriate for the game and is overall good.
The game also has some odd text issues and spelling mistakes which won't hinder your experience.
The text issues are only present if you lack the correct font on your computer.

Also very easy achievements if you care about that kinda stuff.

In any case its free. So like you might as well give it a try.

TL;DR: Good short game with good story, just annoying to complete fully.

33472151.review:
Pontos Positivos

Basicamente esse jogo nos mostra a realidade de pessoas apaixonadas e diferentes jornadas que o amor pode-nos leva. (Eu também estou apaixonado, mas ela não me valoriza e tem outra pessoa que gosta de min, porém não tenho muita coragem de interagir com esta outra garota por não a conhecer direito e pelo fato dela ser muito linda).
Escolhemos o que o personagem Willie ira fazer na trama explorando e dialogando assim nos direcionando aos vários finais do jogo. (Onde o tempo que demoramos em falar influencia no final também)
Os diálogos que o jogo nos proporciona através das diferentes cenas que mostram diferentes personalidades de Liza e Luisa através de pequenas partes.
Musica boa que consegue retratar o ambiente de amor mostrado no jogo 

Pontos Negativos
Repetir várias vezes até encontra um final que leve a outro final diferente torna o jogo um tanto repetitivo por ser um jogo bem curto.
O tempo que somos obrigados a esperar para realizar os finais. Causa muita falta de interatividade neste jogo.

本评论涉及剧透


进行了33周目，标柏被拒绝了17次。
本游戏虽然只有区区一个场景，但是游戏的完成度却很高，可以算一个优秀的独幕剧？其实一提到告白这个敏感的话题以及进入到一个和宣传片里相似但是不完全类似的场景，我就有一种预感----这个白估计是表不出什么好结果了。
在操作了了几个回合之后玩家就能感受到这是一款类似 <土拨鼠之日> (<Groundhog Day>)的在无限的重复轮回中慢慢摸索着，从不变中寻求突破。
bgm很不错耐听。
这里我要说几个小小的不满：
1.在一开始的摸索之中，我以为是靠探索环境要素或者别的更有选择性的结果推动了我发现了各种隐藏的线索（我自己玩到了3块碎片9个结局），然而看完攻略以后才知道线索是靠结局的数量来触发的，而很多结局仅仅靠左上角不同时间的去告白触发而已，这个小计时器在现实中的意义不是很明显却能影响女主拒绝我的各种理由（话说从八字不合（星座）到我我们好好学习吧啊，从发好人卡到我已经有喜欢的人了，作者不是被人拒绝了很多次就是很有拒绝这么有经验）倒是那个超时没有表白，妹纸直接走了这个蛮合适的
2.就是关卡谜题设计的有点太耿直了？比如最后一排一本非常出戏的带着拼图和密码锁的笔记本，如果能和教室的背景融合得更不露痕迹就好了这样代入感会更加真实。（我可能对解谜部分太吹毛求疵了）



最后的最后紫毛小姑凉是不是照搬作者自己的性格原型啊，或者择偶标准什么的~~

33462926.review:
The game is a bit repetetive and it's a pain when you find yourself stuck unable to find the last couple of endings.

But overall I really enjoyed it and didn't expect that bitter sweet ending at all.

I would recommend not looking around in the reviews too much if you don't like spoilers. 
Since some of them have spoilers.

The gameplay actually reminded me a bit of rogue-like games in some way.
The game is short about 1-3 hours, but have multiple endings (20 in total) and the last is the True ending.

(something you might want to know is that you have to get all the previous endings first, to unlocked the true ending, they are essential for the full experience of the story)

I would recommend trying to complete in one playthrough .
or try to look at some walkthroughs if you get stuck instead of leaving the game unfinished.

33455734.review:
“今天是她的生日呢”未宇侧过身看向正在熟睡的小珊。
今天是阑珊的生日。本应该在家里陪妻子的他，却因为公司不给假期从而迫不得已的去上班。
他真的很爱她。在每次同学聚会上都会炫耀一番，甚至在公司聚会上也会说他有一位好妻子。
据未宇说，阑珊在高中时是一个很内向的女生，可能是因为学习好话少吧。但在表白成功时，当未宇问到：“你为什么会...”阑珊喊出来的是“你个傻子！！！！！！！是你在高中给我的希望啊！！！！”

晚上下班，未宇去了蛋糕店。
当手里拿着早在一个月前就订好的蛋糕时，却不知道死神早已向他招手。
一辆货车，就这样结束掉了他的生命...
时间停留在将近七点钟左右...
——————————————————————————
未宇在一瞬间看到了自己的童年，自己的初中，自己的高中...以及那个不知性别的恶魔，仿佛在吸噬着自己的时间和记忆。
意识越来越模糊...
当未宇再一次有意识时，他看到自己回到了高中。
（也许人在死后，作为生前那段最为强烈的“回忆/意识/记忆”会为自己所制造个空间，把自己永远困在自己的空间里吧）
和当时的高中一样。唯一有所不同的是自己总是在晚上放学时才刚刚睡醒和教室里不知道哪个粗心的同学留下铅笔盒不带回家。
“不管啦，有她就好。”
“她还是那么高冷，不爱说话。”
“啊。她还是和以前一样是个学霸呢”
我去跟她表白吧...以后她可是我的妻子！
——————————————————————————
第一天。“她，她无视了我？！”
第二天。“你说什么？！我听不见！”
（第二天晚，又有一名同学留下来了。我向她询问过原因，可是不知道为什么就是赖在教室里不走。我只知道她叫熙轨。
从一开始我叫她离开“喂，同学。你妨碍我表白了。”到后来她给我鼓励，给我希望，让我坚持。以及给我有着心的杯子...
熙轨同学不会喜欢我吧，哈哈哈哈哈哈。我可是有心上人了哦。）
第三天。“放弃吧，我们是不可能在一起的。”
第四天。“你知道吗，星座书上说我们不合适哦。”
第五天。“我只想和你做朋友”
第六天。“我不会和你在一起”
第七天。“你是一个好人。但我们不适合”
第八天。“我们才高一，以后还会有高考，请不要打扰我学习好吗”
第九天。“道歉，我不喜欢男生哦”
第十天。“她...和她..走了。”
第十一天。“我还是放弃吧...”
第十二天。“阑珊同学，我，我，我，我想说什么着...好尴尬啊，我先走了"
第十三天。“我做不到啊！...”
第十四天。...
第十五天。...
（你说过明明是我在高中给你的希望。可现在你为什么给我绝望。）
第十六天。...
第十七天。...
第十八天。...
第十九天。...
——————————————————————————
第二十天。熙轨同学...
错。我其实根本就不是你的同学。你知道你自己吗，你早死了。死因是车祸，当场身亡。
那你是?..
我其实是一个恶魔，你也可以理解为是一个鬼魂。专门吸食你们人类的灵魂从而生存。
可惜你的意识太强烈了啊，我根本无法吸食。无奈之下只能进入你的空间...


恶魔喜欢上人类是很可怕的事情呢。
啊，可惜这种事情还是发生了。


我模仿着她，给你鼓励，给你希望，让你坚持..甚至把我心爱的杯子都给你...
模仿着高中时的你们...
但是你为什么还是不会喜欢我？！






“因为你始终不是她啊。”

33441996.review: I just happened to stumble upon this game one day and thought it would be a decent timewaster. Man was I wrong about that. This game is an abosulte gem! For the two hours I played this game, I could not get enough of it. The story is well crafted and exciting even if the characters are a little bland. Not only that, but there are 20 different possible endings that you could get while doing this game. Each one is different from the other ones and some are straight up hilarious. I'd highly recommend using one of the community guides in order to help you with some of these endings because a few of them you wouldn't be able to get through normal means. The game might seem bland in the beginning, but once you figure out where certain things are and get though the first 15 endings, the story picks up tenfold. I'd highly recommend this to anyone who has a few hours to spare and is looking for a short game with a great story.

33414806.review:
After completing around 50% of "Confess my Love" I was sure that I was going to leave a negative review for it. The game was dragging on, tedious, and true to the store description- "boring". The only reason I carried on to the end was for accidentally finding a spoiler that piqued my interest, and I must say, the last few endings for the game really turned it around completely.

The game itself is cute enough, and the intro music is beautiful. The characters are fairly bland, and the translation/spelling errors are hideously frequent. I think though that the title being free excuses most of the bad points. I would only recommend this game if you had a couple of hours to waste away on some achievements, but that's a recommendation nontheless. 

If I could change something about this game it would definitely be the number of boring average endings that you have to go through to get to the good stuff. It's something like 15 endings until the story starts tying together and getting interesting? I say maybe half of that would be much better and would make the entire experience less monotonous, but that's just my two cents :)

33404418.review:
[h1]一个关于传达不到的爱恋的故事[/h1]

你发现自己在教室里醒来，而那个女孩正在前方写着作业。

明明是个普通的女生，却又似乎和其他女孩子不同。不知何时，开始不自觉地在意着她，关注着她的一切。

她每天都在学校做完作业才离开，听说是因为她之后还要去便利店打工照顾家，尽管如此她的成绩仍然名列前茅。再看看自己，明明什么都不用担心，成绩却始终在中游浮动，不禁对这样的自己感到失望。

看着她认真的背影时，内心里升起来的却是一股股的...涩。对，艰涩得透着绝望。这种感情就是喜欢吗？

感觉这样下去不行却无法自拔。想不去在意，却不由自主望向那个方向，想她想得昏昏沉沉。喜欢是这么难过的感觉吗？

感情应该是复杂的。但我知道，对她并不是浅薄的同情。坚强的她不需要谁同情--反而是在角落里思考着这种事的我，透着刺目的可笑。这样的我，她会怎么看呢？

我，应该告诉她吗？

为她而买的草莓蛋糕，无人时悄悄地对自己低语，一次又一次地练习着对话。终于鼓足勇气来到她的面前，看着她可爱的侧脸，说出心底最大的秘密，但她为什么从来不接受我的喜欢呢？究竟要如何将这份爱恋传达到呢？

33360839.review:
[b]The love hymn, disappeared in a flash[/b]

As we grow and develop, we often see someone in a different light. Whether it is from their looks, how they carry themselves, or that after knowing them for a long time you just cross over to liking them more. Developing a crush on the person. Worrying whether or not they will be accepting and go out with you, or even that they are single. With how much “The worst thing they can say is ‘No’” is said, it is still heartbreaking being turned down. 

Confess My Love goes on the premise of, well, confessing your love. You play as Willie, who admired his classmate, Liza, from afar for a while. Planning to tell her that he loved her on this fateful day. With 20 endings to look forward to, you go forward hoping that Willie’s heart is not broken in one of them. Every ending playing off on how you might of felt in your own experience. 

I do recommend looking at a guide for this game, as even if you figure out the general way of getting endings, there are some that stray away. Ith that said, most of the endings are timed based. Which in turn makes Willie more prepared in his words as you wait longer and of course Liza’s responses change along with it. Other endings depend on items and interacting with the other character Julie. With only the last few dependant on you doing the other endings, as well as timing and items, to achieve them as items do appear over time. 

As the ending is really a twist that you really only think about after a certain amount of endings, I will not spoil it for you. But it is chilling and it is only amplified by the soundtrack switching it’s usual light hearted but fast paced theme when confessing. And at the end very heartbreaking, especially with all that you go through. Though I will say that I love games that play with how it can interact with files or the computer. The game tells you what is going to happen, and it happens on our side. 

I really like the pixel art they decided to use, though the indication of an important item was of center to the interaction point other than one of them. With the character portraits, I also wonder why they only have one of them show completely. They do show Willie’s on the title screen, but Liza’s is the only one to completely show. It kinda can be linked to what the ending tells you, but it does seems like they were not finished.

[h1]Overall[/h1]
+ Pixel art
+ Music
+ Interesting way to tie in multiple endings to the storyline

+/- Some grammar issues 
+/- Most character portraits seemed unfinished or just not included.

Confess My Love brings a simple story line of a boy finally confessing to his crush. Containing multiple endings tied to timing, items, and/or interacting with Julia. If you have a free day and not feeling the games you already have, try this out. It will certainly make your boring day interesting.

33309986.review:
Don't worry; This review contains [b] NO SPOILERS!(PLOTWISE) [/b]
[h1] INTRODUCTION [/h1]
For starters, the controls can be somewhat confusing for people who have never played 2D anime RPGs like myself. Fortunately, I was able to adapt to the controls within 2 to 3 minutes. As the developers said, this game can get quite boring and a bit of trial and error unless you look up the walkthroughs on the internet. It also has a 5 minute time limit until you get a game over and retry again but eventually (or not unless you look up on the internet) they'll become important for the ending. The last few achievements can be a bit of a pain to do unless you search up the walkthroughs. I almost wanted to cry when I read out the ending.

[h1] STORY AND CHARACTERS [/h1]
Anyways, you play as a high school kid named Willie, who tries to confess to his crush, Liza (Yes, it's with a Z) and the other character, Julie, as Willie's classmate. Willie wants to confess but seems to be afraid of the consequences if Liza rejects him.Seems like a simple concept right? Well, as I said before, there's a lot of trial and error involved in the game and may seem boring to newer players after a couple of minutes. The character sprites look very cute and adorable. :D. The ending actually made me cry; Feels bad man... It really does... 

[h1] CONCLUSION [/h1]
I was able to complete the game within around 2 hours thanks to the guides on the internet.While 'Confess my Love' may be a frustrating RnG game for newer players with multiple endings and a 5 minute time limit, it does have a very emotional plot twist in the true ending and very cute character designs. I would reccomend it to people who are into cute anime RPGs or for those who are looking for a short story, multi-ending game while using their brain to navigate through the game.

[h1] NOTE [/h1]
After you have completed the true ending, there will be an extra epilogue to which completing so( through a somewhat compulsory option??), will render the game not playable. So, If you would like to replay the game, you would need to go to the "Confess my Love" game folder and search for the data folder and delete. This would not only make you play it again if you like to replay games but also unlocks a secret achievement for those achivement completists. Search it up for more info.

[h1] PROS [/h1]
+Cute Character Designs and Backstories (Backstories are accessed through epilouge)
+Amazing Plot Twist (In my opinion)

[h1] NEUTRAL [/h1]
~Game is very short to complete if you look up tutorials or have a smart brain. May not be for those who play who want in-depth story games for 8+ hours

[h1] CONS [/h1]
-Can be very RnG without a guide ([i]Thanks to developer dspzzy for correcting me![/i])
-Controls can be somewhat confusing
-Not replayable unless save data is deleted

[h1] Rating: [/h1]8/10

Signed by
𝓐𝓈𝒽 𝓥𝑒𝓇𝓂𝒿𝓁𝓁𝒾𝑜𝓃
of the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/HiddenAnimeGroup] ᴀɴιᴍᴇ Steam Community Group

33301970.review:
This is a very good game. It comes with the great formula of developing a good relationship between the characters and the viewer at the beginning and then crushing them with an unexpected and detrimental truth creating emotional tension.

You get to play as a student that wants to confess his love to his crush. From the very beginning you will presume imminent failure and you will not be wrong. The little boy is kept in this cycle of desperately wanting to confess his feelings and be accepted by his crush. As you play the game, you will find out some very amusing reasons not to start a relationship between Lisa and Willie, like their zodiac signs do not match, she has a boyfried, or she is into girls. You will understand why she always rejects the boy at the very end of the game and it will hit the feelings very hard.

The game itself is pretty decents. The characters are well drawn and look great in this pixelated style. The only problem I have is about the controls of the character, it feels very weird and not very fluent when you are walking in diagonal line and sometimes you need to struggle to get the right angle and position to interact with other objects and characters. 
The music is good as well. It blends very well with the feelings the game wants to transmit.

9/10 great game for the price of nothing.

33258671.review:
TL;DR: It is a simple game with too many translation errors to make the story driven game worthwhile. It's a decent time waster for a free game, but only because it is free.

I didn't want to write a review until after I completed the game and unlocked all the achievments. For a simple story game it is rather flat. For the most part all you do is wait beside a girl's desk while you waste time in order to unlock different dialogue options.
The puzzle portion of it was the most interesting part.
The controls of the game were very annoying to use, but they were manageable. It made getting some of the endings rather bothersome as you were timed.
At first I thought this might have been made by a child, but I then realized that it was made by someone who doesn't speak English as their native language. I let pretty much all of the atrocious translations slide, but there were a couple of things that would have translated no matter what language you spoke. Some of the later endings had squares instead of spaces. They were clearly not meant to be there and just seemed like lazy editing to me. Another thing is they spelled the main girl's name wrong at the ending scene. It was spelt correctly the entire time until the very end. It just seemed like the creator got sloppy nearing the end and just wanted to finish the game.

Overall it was a decent time killer, but that's all it was. The translation errors made the game almost unplayable. As a story based game, I don't think I should have trouble reading the story. Reading some of the other reviews I am not sure what they saw in this game that "made them cry", but there really wasn't much substance to the story.

Personally I would not recommend this game, but seeing as it would probably be fine in its native language AND it's free I will give it a thumbs up. This probably took some time to create. Overall I would probably say 3/10

[h1] 手残党发言：总的来说这款游戏虽然算不上优秀，但还有些趣味。低于预期但玩玩也无妨。[/h1]

55分。说下我的大分标准，打分是百分制，精度5分，常规区间30到90，50分是不过不失，亦即个人理解的及格分。系统操作，画面立绘皆在中流以下水准，音乐不过不失，人设。。。额看不出来。

[list]
    [*]在进入特殊结局前几乎没有剧情，止步于此的话大概就只是个略带恶趣味的戏谑之作；
    [*]玩到特殊结局觉得太套路，展开生硬没有理由和必要，当然我也是被手残所困扰屡屡被抓玩的苦不堪言。。。
    [*]最终结局的却让人眼前一亮，在经历犹豫，挫败，恐怖，困惑种种之后，故事真相缓缓拉开。虽然稍微苦涩但玩家在最后总算收获了一丝治愈。
[/list]

恋爱使人变得更好。只要她过得幸福就好。

这不是一款适合抱着高度期待而玩的游戏，收获可能就在于不断被拒绝的共鸣和真相揭露的一丝感慨。当然作为一款免费的游戏，不足100m的容积，实在没什么好挑剔的。每周目1到5分钟，一共20个结局，平均2小时应该可以打通？有空闲的话可以尝试一下。当然建议看攻略。

嗯，游戏共进行了34周目，你被拒绝了23次，游玩的过程辛苦您了。哈哈。

33209247.review:
Despite the creator of this game saying it is boring, I really enjoyed it a lot. In Confess My Love, you are Willie, a 15-year-old high school student who wants to confess his feelings toward his classmate Liza. There are 20 different endings, and you will need to interact with different objects and characters to unlock all of them. As you may have read elsewhere, Willie gets rejected. A lot. Despite this, this game is definitely worth your time. 

 I really liked a lot of things in this game. The pixel chibi art style gave it a very casual, warm, innocent, yet mysterious atmosphere. Some people have problems with the poor translation, but I think it added nicely to the innocent atmosphere. The soundtrack was spectacular. The puzzles were somewhat challenging and the story was very rewarding. Also, it’s free and the true ending does deliver. Overall, I would give it a 4/5. 

The reason I give this game a 4/5 is because while the story is interesting and memorable, it sometimes misses nuance and relies a little too much on common storytelling tropes. For example, every time Willie is rejected by Liza, Willie’s reactions gave me the feeling I was supposed to “hate” her even when she was kind and reasonable. This didn’t really make sense to me since the rest of Willie’s reactions usually express sadness and self-loathing, not anger. Overall, it felt disrespectful to women and just made it more difficult to relate to Willie’s character. This game also includes violence against women and an awkward line that implies gay people aren’t always truthful about themselves. I sort of understand why the violence was included, as I felt the shock value of seeing violence. However, in the end I don’t think it really fit into the overall story or made me feel closer to any of the characters. It’s a storytelling trope that we’ve seen in dozens of other games that never seemed to work. These were some things that I thought were just a little lazy and predictable in an otherwise solid game. 

Overall, Confess My Love is a very interesting mini game that is worth the three hours it takes to play it. The true ending might just make you cry. If you don’t want to experience the things I disliked, don’t play it, but in general I highly recommend it!

这是至今我玩过最棒的免费游戏了！

其实一开始我是看评测才玩的游戏，所有的事情全都从一个告白开始，一共20种结局，刚开始玩的时候一脸懵逼，因为无论你怎样告白都会失败，后来你玩久了就慢慢发现，很多道具都是结局数量达到够多的时候才开启的，那么问题来了，男主告白了无数次，却总是停留在15日那一天，而道具却根据你的（告白失败的）结局数目开启的，这难不成是从零开始的告白日！？首先，我是抱着凑合的心态在晚上凌晨1点钟开始玩的（离线模式，所以无记录在案），以为只是个玩告白的小游戏，后来玩了40分钟，达成了前15个结局，发现其实这是个轮回游戏，终于，在凌晨2点的时候我开启了异变房间......MD吓屎宝宝了！！三更半夜的，这TM到底还是个恐怖游戏！16、17、18、19个结局完全变成了悬疑惊悚大片了好吗！我的小心脏......憋了20分钟的慌，终于打通了第20个结局......

.........

我深深地犹豫了好一阵子，仔细思考了一下人生，揣摩了一下真正的结局......好伤感，我就不剧透了...
这绝对是一部悬疑、爱情、惊悚、治愈、致郁神作！（个人评价）


在我离开这里之前，能帮我个忙么......

（我想听到...在你心底深处，是否还存在着那一丝美好，那一丝感动......）

33029108.review:
曾在愿望单中压箱底了好久[i] （其实本作于2015发布，2017才登陆Steam） [/i]，这次一口气100%全成就通关完结，撒花~

[b] 总共进行39周目，被拒绝19次 [/b]

[h1]“本游戏非常无聊且恶意，存在大量的重复和浪费时间”[/h1]
                                                      ——作者
（作者大人你到底经历了什么才能创造出这盈漫恶意的作品）

解谜向AVG，并且是十分有新意的单一场景多周目多结局AVG，本作的场景只有教室，音乐也不出彩，立绘？可以说本作并不以高制作素质见长，但探索要素与对话文本量配合出的演出效果相当赞。

表面上本作非常无聊，懦弱的主角决定放学后向心仪的女生告白，但主角无论怎么做，都会被女生以各种理由拒绝。而前桌的紫毛妹子只会一脸坏笑，什么忙也帮不上[spoiler] （紫毛那么可爱为什么不能攻略！） [/spoiler]。似乎真的如作者所说，这是一个“失恋模拟器”……[spoiler] （顺便吐槽一下，一般来说多周目多结局游戏的达成方法是不同的探索物品，但本作中各种探索物品似乎都对结局没有产生影响，最终最终最终我才发现影响因素居然是告白时间啊摔！太恶意了！） [/spoiler]

怎么可能？

在经历了各种告白失败的结局后，我猜想本作可能在玩后置平行世界的梗，就像电影《源代码》和游戏《命运石之门》一般，主角在不断地告白失败中寻找能打破结局的KEY，找出能够达成告白成功的方法。[spoiler] （而这些平行世界相互交织相互影响，最后都指向一个终极问题的答案——42！） [/spoiler]于是我不停地探索，班长的密码笔记本、蛋糕、水杯、拼图碎片等，尝试各种变量，重复同样的结局，希望能找出那个关键点。

真是杀时间呢！

在不停的尝试中，教室中逐渐浮现出一丝丝诡异，比如奇怪的密码笔记本，比如自己出现的红旗，比如停摆的时钟、比如紫毛似乎了解所有的事情……

本作一共20个结局，对应20个成就[b] （还有隐藏成就请大家慢慢探索~） [/b]。前15个结局是所谓告白失败和自我放弃的结局，后面6个结局是这整个游戏的精髓，也是整个游戏的谜底，请一定要坚持下去！

谜底：[spoiler] 主角在为告白准备蛋糕时遭遇车祸身亡，未能传达心意的执念扭曲形成了这个封闭思维空间，不断上演着告白的场景，但对告白失败的恐惧使主角内心逐渐扭曲（表现于变鬼结局，一直觉得变鬼结局并非女生变为恶鬼，而是主角害怕的心境将女主异化为恶鬼，心中的喜爱转化为憎恨，并亲手用刀刺向女主，完成转变）。紫毛妹子并不是主角的同学，而是路过的恶魔，为回收主角的灵魂而来，并帮助主角了却心愿（所以说紫毛妹子那么可爱为什么不能攻略！）。最终主角放下执念，随恶魔而去，这个空间崩溃。而游戏会自动关闭，并且无法开始新游戏（空间不存在，初始化失败！）。 [/spoiler] 致郁。

其实大多数人的告白失败和游戏中表现得差不多吧，对于不喜欢的他，女生有一千种理由拒绝他的心意，无论这种心意多么执着与单纯。游戏过程中，看着女生认真的背影，心中忽然地触动，那个一直在心中最深处的背影，那些纠结、欣喜、紧张、欢乐、急切与失落，所有的回忆蜂拥而出，焦急而盈满泪水，让人有种有点悲伤却又释然的心情。

PS.
关于结局，主角在了却心愿后离开，游戏结束并无法再次开始。
但若一直无法通关，主角的灵魂一直徘徊与教室，心中的执念无法放下，只能不断地重复这告白日，不断地体会告白失败的心碎，对于主角这大概才是最悲惨的结局。
请大家一定要完成最终的结局啊！

33025833.review:
花了三个多小时完成所有成就，来说说自己的感想
[b] 首先，说说这游戏的优点和玩点 [/b]：
1、短小彪悍(没错就是彪悍，至于为什么自己去体验）
2、花式被拒满足你的抖M心理
3、告白被拒无尽轮回让你崩溃（没有攻略的情况下）
4、寻找道具为游戏增添了一丝解谜元素和悬疑气息
5、让人感慨万千的结局
[b] 然后还有点不足的地方 [/b]：
1、和一般的像素风RPG不同的45°视角和操作，让人蹩脚
2、开启里房间和特定结局的操作有些重复和繁琐
3、意义不明的无人BUG房间
[b] 最后，说说对游戏内容的感想 [/b]：
不知道作者经历过什么才做出了这个恶意满满的游戏，反正一开始我是心态有点玩崩了（毕竟让我想起了告白失败的黑历史有木有）。不过被拒绝几次后也平复下来了，就抱着体验所有被拒方式的心情玩了下去。但玩到后面的结局时眉头微微一皱发现事情并不简单……当最后挖掘出游戏的结局的时候，让人有种有点悲伤却又释然的心情。不过我想，作者最终想表达的，是希望每个人都能去大胆的追求，不论是自己的所爱，还是其他的东西，毕竟不试一试，怎么知道带来的是尴尬和失落，还是如同草莓蛋糕一般的甜蜜和温暖呢？希望每个人都能迎来自己人生中所期盼的告白日。

全成就达成~变异房的条件老达不成，最后才发现要把两边窗户的窗帘都拉上...一直以为右边不能拉的...

流程不长，而且大部分时间都花在刷前十五个普通结局上了，因为除了两个蛋糕结局之外其他结局的条件都是时间，所以等的过程比较无聊，有种强行拉长游戏时间的感觉。

进变异房的条件不看攻略很难想到，要在四分钟内拿齐四个碎片借杯子浇水开日记拿钥匙开抽屉拿小刀再拉上窗帘让紫毛离开也是有一定难度的，特别是这游戏的操作又不怎么舒服，从变异房逃出的窍门就是从教室下方绕一下，不要直接往门那里跑。拿了小刀拉了窗帘之后的结局七大概就是男主黑化杀了阑珊，所以之后阑珊才会变鬼...

作为免费游戏还不错啦，有卡的话花上几块钱买也ok的，像素风的画面很可爱，不过阑珊的立绘为什么不用标题画面那张...还有我要紫毛的立绘啦明明是重要角色的！

32969094.review:
Wow, esse foi um dos melhores jogos free to play que joguei na Steam, principalmente pela história imprevisível e jogabilidade simples. É impressionante como os desenvolvedores conseguiram aproveitar uma pequena quantidade de elementos do cenário para produzir 20 finais diferentes. Inicialmente ele pode parecer sem nexo e enjoativo, por exigir muito tempo para resolver cada final, até completar o verdadeiro, no qual tudo é devidamente explicado. Enfim, me surpreendi e recomendo para todos, vale a pena gastar 3h/4h jogando.

[spoiler] Eu sou muito medrosa e acabei me assustando nos finais sombrios, cheguei a pensar que Liza era algum tipo de psicopata e iria matar Willie e Julie no final, ou que ela iria dar um fora nele e confessar o amor por Julie, mas acabou que nenhuma das minhas teorias se concretizaram. A sensação de perceber que tudo que você imaginou para o final não é real, é um dos motivos que faz esse jogo ser acima da média dos jogos free. [/spoiler]

32966925.review:
Confess My Love ist ein kostenloses kleines Lebenssimulation, quasi Adventure. Story auf den Punkt gebracht: Kleiner Junge mag kleines Mädchen und nutzt die Gunst der Stunde und will ihr seine Liebe beichten. Im Prinzip geht es dann eigentlich nur darum zu dem Mädel zu wuseln, mit ihr zu reden (was gar nicht so leicht ist bei der Steuerung) und dann diverse Textoptionen abzuklicken. Unter meiner Führung hat sich ziemlich fiese Antworten eingefangen. Das ist aber gar nicht schlecht, so bekommt der Knabe früh Hornhaut auf der Seele und lernt die erbarmungslose emotionale Kälte der Frauen zu fürchten ;-)

32890654.review:
A surprisingly fun and charming free game!

Pros:
+Cute main music theme
+Interesting plot device of confession
+Endearing characters
+Sprite art was well suited to the game
+Creative endings
+Overall a good experience

Cons:
-Some English grammar issues (but easily understood meanings)
-Some artwork portraits felt incomplete/could have been included

The concept is simple, a boy who wants to confess his love to a girl. Each of the endings are tied to the timer, items and Julia. I did resort to using the tip page, but found the bulletin board very useful in keeping track of endings. I highly recommend playing this game to completion, even if that means looking up a guide (which is on the game website).

32837885.review:
Un asombroso título sin duda, a pesar de ser un juego corto y que se puede terminar en poco tiempo, deja un mensaje muy especial: [b]"No dudar de nuestras decisiones, el tiempo es relativo y no se sabe qué puede llegar a pasar"[/b]

El desarrollo de la historia se lleva a cabo dentro un salón de clases en el cuál, tú eres un estudiante qué está enamorado de una compañera y tu único objetivo es confesar tu amor ante ella, en cierta forma y mientras juegas, buscas la manera de quedar solos tú y la chica que te gusta en el salón para decirle tus sentimientos, lastimosamente ella te rechazará de varias formas, pero nuestro protagonista de alguna manera logra parte de su objetivo.

>> Excelente historia.
>> Buena música y sonidos.
>> Personajes adorables.
>> Un bonito mensaje.

Nota. [u]Intenten terminar todos los finales que puedan y no se rindan hasta encontrar el verdadero final.[/u]

> Pagaría una segunda parte o una versión más extendida del juego, definitivamente un título que no puede pasar por alto y que debo recomendar 9/10 sin lugar a dudas.

32737456.review: 时间杀手 耗时3个钟终于通关 40周目，拒绝次数23.这款免费游戏给我体验上还行吧，搞的我挺郁闷的，我觉得应该归类为治愈游戏（滑稽），另外剧情上的设定还行，被拒绝的次数跟理由简直让我怀疑人生，现实里这种情况应该不多见才对，我以为这是一个攻略妹子的游戏，服了，这是一个巨坑。[spoiler]在变异的世界里确实把我给吓着了，而且我也没想懂怎么去逃走，我还以为是用刀跟女主刚正面然后我发现密码不对，只能赤手空拳，后来才发现可以按shift键去跑，虽然如此 也有失败的经历（被桌子卡位）。最后嘛男主居然已经车祸身亡这个结尾确实让人万万没想到，运用到了高考作文的结尾写作手法，	[/spoiler]虽然我也觉得这个游戏的设定有点让人难以捉摸，有很多个隐藏要素是个迷，人物只有3个，班长的邪恶笔记本，不由得猜想这游戏是怎么个设定法，带有很多解谜要素。这游戏是确实让我致郁了，不管怎么说，免费的游戏能带给我这样的体验给个好评完全没问题，小游戏高质量，短小而精悍，BGM不错 请作者继续加油。

32714513.review:
[h1]Confess my Love[/h1]

Az indie ipar azért olyan színes, és híres a PC játékok terén, mert tud, és mer olyat alkotni, amit a nagy kiadók valószínűleg gondolkodás nélkül visszadobnának a futószalagról. A Confess My Love egyetlen egy helyszíne egy osztályterem, és pusztán három szereplővel operál. Az alapkoncepció nagyon egyszerű, Willie-t, egy kamaszfiút irányítunk, aki érzelmeket táplál az első padban ülő lány iránt.
Legalábbis így gondoljuk... Azonban minél több végkifejlettnek álcázott mérföldkövet teljesítünk, annál mélyebb és depresszívebb történet rajzolódik ki előttünk, míg végül el nem érünk a végére. Erről csak annyit, hogy nagyon szomorú, és rendkívül megindító lezárást kerekítettek a be nem teljesült szerelem köré.
A hangulat, a mechanikák, a zene és az egyszerű játékmenet kombinációja tökéletesen egymásba passzol, így az ember egy szórakoztató két-három órával lehet gazdagabb. 

[b]Pro:[/b]
- Ingyenes
- Könnyű teljesítmények
- Nagyon jó történet
- Dinamikus, komplex, jól összerakott
- Játszatja magát
- Titokzatos, mély, hangulatos
- A zenei hanghatások elképesztően adják a hangulatot

[b]Kontra:[/b]
- Az irányítás elsőre nagyon furcsának hatott, és ez a harmadik végkifejlett után enyhült csak

Mindenkinek tudom ajánlani. 7.5/10
[spoiler]A torta egy hazugság.




(Najó, jelen esetben nem az.)
[/spoiler]

32680751.review:
Habituellement pas fan des RPG, des jeux donnant l'impression d'avoir été faits sous RPG Maker ou de thèmes un peu orienté Manga et ciblant principalement les weaboos, Confess My Love avait en apparence rien du jeu fait par moi. Mais après avoir bouclé toutes les différentes fin, je ne regrette absolument pas de m'être laissé tenté par cette petite perle gratuite.

[h1]Confess Your Love ![/h1]

Le jeu suit l'histoire du petit Willie, un lycéen amoureux de sa camarade Liza. Le but du jeu est simple, vous devez confesser votre amour à Liza. Le jeu se déroule dans une seule pièce, mais il y a en tout 20 fins différentes à débloquer qui font progressivement avancer l'histoire.

Et si vous avez le courage d'aller jusqu'au bout, vous decouvriez une incroyable chute qui ne vous laissera certainement pas indifférent.

Comptez environ 2 à 3 heures de jeu pour explorer toutes les fins, et si vous êtes bloqués des guides de la communauté sont disponibles

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

Confess My Love est un petit jeu indépendant sans prétention, avec des graphismes 8 bit soignés tenant dans à peine 30 mo et tournant sur n'importe quelle configuration. On pourra sans doute lui reprocher parfois une traduction approximative et l'absence de réglages graphiques ( la résolution doit être aux alentours de 480x320 ), mais cela n'enlève rien à son charme et à son histoire qui ravira même les moins initiés.

En somme, une véritable petite perle comme on aimerait en voir plus, et qui plus est totalement gratuite !

和[spoiler]橙光游戏[spoiler]中的school days一样充满了对情侣[spoiler] 狗[spoiler] 间的满满恶意
当然这边也强推一波，这个算是剧情短的，只在一个空间内发生的事情，如果大家想玩流程更长一点的，可以去[spoiler]橙光游戏[spoiler] 体验一下school days的快感，当真是虐死我了

总体来说，当我第一次进游戏，以为会是像尸体派对那样的恐怖游戏，然后温馨的音乐和不错的背景让我舒缓了点
结果，确实只有一张地图，三个角色，而我还傻呼呼地直接冲上去表白
当然以各种[spoiler]不正常[spoiler]理由收尾，像什么星座啦、同性恋啦、学习啦，反正只要女生不喜欢你，你怎么可能会把到妹嘛

最终结局不能说HE或者是BE，这是一条TE线，或者说应该是BE中的最好结局了
交代了作品游戏的整体背景，很感人的一幕

当然作为一个短流程，多周目不断重复的游戏，我要吐槽！！！！！

1、熙轨对话时有一个选项，借水瓶，喂喂，喂喂喂，我怎么不记得现实中有女生会二话不说直接借给一个不太熟悉的男生水瓶啊喂，虽然这是重要道具
2、我其实压根没想到可以搜索各个桌子
3、[spoiler]变鬼那个结局逃脱率吓死我了，直接gg了6次，最后才按了←方向键连加两次enter过去，这鬼不是一般的速度[spoiler]
4、和school days一样，竟然真的有[spoiler]杀人结局[spoiler]，这可能是必出结局了，当然school days 更黑暗一点
5、没什么好说的，特别好评！[spoiler]大家一定要试试啊，不能我一个人被拒绝那么多次不是？[spoiler]
