32669465.review:
This was a beautiful game. Length doesn't matter as long as you can tell a good story. While this game doesn't have a storyline until the final few endings, (The final ending in particular is an EXTREME tear-jerker.), this is one of those games that I can make a real connection with. 

As someone who's been rejected like this in the past, (albeit with less demons, nightmares and death), this hit really close to home for me watching Willie get rejected over and over again. I actually cried during the final ending, which I won't spoil. This game can actually get a bit creepy later on, (I'm lookin' at you endings 16 & 17), and I genuinely got a bit creeped out the first time I saw *that* thing. [Not spoiling anything is hard man...]

Overall, while this game may not be overly long, and you may need to consult a guide for the final few endings (I know i did...) this is a game that you should DEFINITELY download, because it's extremely clever, sad, and emotionally investing.


And hey, it's free. Might have forgotten to mention that.

That final secret achivement though....

32629232.review:
El miedo. El miedo es una constante en nuestra vida. 
Siempre caminamos dudando de lo que vamos a hacer. Sobre lo que esta bien o mal. Vivimos con duda y [b] la duda lleva al miedo. [/b]

¿Que pasa si se molesta?
¿Que pasa si la daño?
¿Que pasa si me odia?
¿Que pasa si me ignora?
¿Que pasa si...?

______

En este corto juego, tomamos el control de un personaje llamado Will. Un chico que despues de clases decide declararsele a la chica que le gusta. Es una premisa bastante simple. La idea del juego es dar un par de pasos y simplemente declararte.

Tener una conversacion

[u] Y ser rechazado.[/u]

Las partidas son cortas, tienes un reloj a tu izquierda superior que te marca cuantos minutos llevas dando vueltas buscando otra forma de declararte, buscando quizas algun objeto que te ayude. Pero sabes que va a pasar, lo sabes muy bien. ¿Que si hay alguna forma de que te acepte? Tienes un total de 20 finales. 20 formas distintas de intentar las cosas. Quizas se vuelva agotador en cierto punto pero el final real, realmente vale la pena. Quizas sea algo cliche pero tiene un mensaje simple muy poco visto en el mundo de los juegos. 

Es una experiencia corte e interesante. No digo que sea el mejor indie del mundo pero, lo tienes ahi gratis. Te lo estan sirviendo en bandeja de plata. Creeme, lo vale. 

Confess My Love es un juego que entiende las limitaciones que tiene y las usa a su favor. Es un juego como deberian ser todos, una experiencia que puedas recordar.

______

[b]8/10[/b]

32623853.review:
ANÁLISE COM SPOILERS- SPOILER ALERT
Eu baixei esse jogo pq o título me chamou atenção, eu achei que iria ser um jogo leve e curto, e ele já me chamou atenção logo de cara, pq mesmo sendo um jogo novo no steam, ele já tinha tradução completa pra português do brasil. Aí eu já sabia que ou o jogo seria muito curto, ou ele tinha a história muito boa, pra alguém ter tido o trabalho de traduzir sem ganhar um tostão pra traduzir. Joguei pá, o jogo começa numa sala de aula, a introdução é um pouco esticada e poderia ser cortada ao rejogar o jogo pra fazer os outros finais, mas tudo bem. Logo eu vejo que se trata de um adventure 2D com visão isométrica(estilo diablo) e só tem um cenário, que é a sala de aula. Você controla Willie com garoto tímido de 15 anos(mas que parece ter 9 por causa do visual chibi) que quer se confessar pra Liza, a garota que ele gosta. São 7 da noite, e só tem os dois na sala. E Julie, a garota que senta na frente da Willie. Se você tentar falar com Liza ela vai te dar um fora. Sempre. o jogo aliás devia se chamar Tome um Fora- O jogo, dá raiva da garota, ela inventa todo tipo de desculpa pra não querer ficar com você, desde o clássico nós deviamos ser apenas amigos, até inventar que é lésbica. O jogo tem 20 finais, e dura até 5 minutos por final. Todos os finais são cumpridos sob certas condições envolvendo ações, e hora do dia. Algo que vai te chamando atenção é que esse jogo lembra vagamente efeito borboleta, cada vez que você falha em se confessar, tem um progresso na sala de aula, seja um item novo pra interagir que irá liberar mais finais ou dialogos novos do protagonista com Julie, a garota de cabelo lilás e olhos vermelhos, ou seja algo sempre muda. Os primeiros 15 finais são relativamente normais, até chegar aos 5 últimos, que você vê que tem algo realmente estranho acontecendo. Eu percebi nessa hora que o personagem devia estar amaldiçoado a sempre voltar àquela sala. Até que um dos finais, a liza aceita ficar com você, só que ela te mata, como se estivesse possuida pelo mochila de criança. E o personagem se lembra que foi morto e tenta avisar ela. Ela obviamente não acredita. No próximo final, se você conseguir tirar Julie da sala, ele ao tentar alertar Liza, acidentalmente, ele a esfaqueia e ela morre. Então vem o último final. julie, te explica que na verdade o protagonista morreu atropelado, depois de comprar um bolo pra Liza. Então ele criou aquela sala em que ele poderia tentar fazer algo que não conseguiu em vida, que é se confessar. Julie na verdade é uma demônia que estava de passagem e viu a alma dele vagar e resolveu tentar ajuda-lo a recuperar a razão. Ela está lá pra reciclar a alma dele. Willie fica triste mas aceita seu destino e como último pedido pede pra entregar o bolo pra Liza.
Esse final eu vi vindo bem de longe, tava muito na cara que ele não iria conseguir, mas mesmo assim, me atingiu com um soco no estômago, em certo ponto eu tinha certeza que ele estava em coma, mas não, ele tinha morrido. Eu fiquei imóvel na cadeira por uns 5 minutos, perplexo, depois que o jogo terminou, tentando digerir tudo que tinha acontecido. Ele é sem dúvidas um dos jogos mais tristes que já joguei. mas valeu a experiência.

虽然是免费游戏玩起来感觉还是蛮好的，结局出乎意料，以为是BE或者HE，不过结局某程度上来说应该算是HE吧~

[spoiler]（我真没想到拒绝理由还有自己是百合）[/spoiler]

到了最后的隐藏结局，我第一次玩的时候一脸懵逼....诶？这就没啦？？？再进游戏也进不去，翻了翻攻略以为自己最后的选项选错了，于是果断二周目，但是发现又进不去游戏，删掉重下强行二周目爆肝2小时到最后结局时发现只能选离开.....

隔着屏幕都能感觉到我的绝望（/TДT)/    

正确的get成就姿势是： 
[list]
    [*]点击离开
    [*]游戏自动关闭后在ConfessMyLove\System目录下
    [*]删除System.rvdata2文件
    [*]再次进入游戏就可以领取隐藏成就
[/list]

以上，祝大家游戏愉快(´・ω・)ﾉ

ง่ายๆก็คือเราได้รับบทเป็น"เด็กหนุ่ม"ที่ตั้งใจจะ"สารภาพรัก"เพื่อนร่วมห้องสาวคนหนึ่ง วนอยู่ในลูป สารภาพยังไง ไม่กล้าสารภาพยังไงก็ยังตื่นกลับมา ณ จุดเริ่มต้น

"ฉันคิดกับเธอแค่เพื่อนจ้ะ" 
"ฉันเป็นเลสเบี้ยนน่ะ โฮะๆๆ"

"ไม่ต้องพูดเลย ไม่อยากได้ยิน ยี้!" 

ฯลฯ 

เป็นเกมเก็บแอคชีฟเม้นท์จริงๆ เพราะไม่เก็บ นี่ก็ไปไม่ถึง ตอนจบที่แท้จริงนะจ๊ะ ว่าเกิดอะไรขึ้น ทำไมเราถึงติดอยู่ในลูปวา.. ต้องเล่นจนเกือบได้ทุกแอคชีฟเม้นท์จริงๆ ถึงจะเจอตอนจบที่แท้จริง

ถ้าใครยังไม่อยากอ่าน ไกด์/คู่มือ นั่งเก็บแอคชีฟเม้นท์ตามไปเลย อยากดื่มด่ำกับอารมณ์ก่อน ก็ขอบอกว่า ข้างซ้ายจะมีตัวเลขนาฬิกาอยู่ การสารภาพรักแต่ละเวลาจะได้ผลลัพธ์แตกต่างกันไปค่ะ! นอกนั้นก็เรื่องไอเท็ม เรื่องช้อยส์ ลองงมกันดูเอง ไม่ยากเท่าไหร่ ยิ่งปลดฉากจบได้ ก็จะยิ่งมีไอเท็มโผล่เข้ามาในฉาก ถึงบางจุด ตัวเราก็จะจำได้ว่ามีอะไรแปลกๆ ไม่ถูกต้องน้า~ 

ปล. ถึงจะโหลดมาเก็บแอคชีฟเม้นท์ แต่เกมส์มันก็สนุกดีนะ คนชอบวิชช่วลโนเวลน่าจะชอบ มันน่าเบื่อตรงวนลูปหน่อยๆ ต้องเล่นหลายๆเที่ยว แต่ก็อีก คนเล่นวิช่วลโนเวลคงชินแล้ว เหมือนเราอ่ะ ; __ ;

32495653.review:
Peguei o jogo sem muitas expectativas e acabei ficando muito feliz com o que encontrei. Este é um game focado na narrativa de uma "histrorinha", não há combate, seu personagem basicamente interage com os npc's e cenário para completar os finais.
Cada run dura no máximo 5 minutos, dentro desse período de tempo vc deve realizar determinadas tarefas que determinam qual o será a conclusão da fase, ao obter um determinado final você libera outros até totalizar 24 finais (20 normais + 4 especiais). O enredo é bastante instigante e o final vai por um caminho extremamente interessante e até mesmo profundo.
O único ponto negativo do jogo é a jogabilidade de rpg maker que as vezes irrita um pouco na hora de mover seu personagem. Há uma fase específica onde você deve correr pela sala que é um saco por causa da locomoção meio travadona.
No geral esse é um grande game free qua vai te garantir um pouquinho mais de 1 h de diversão. Recomendo jogar, afinal é de graça, não há nada o que se perder.

32495223.review:
Un juego con aspecto retro, gratis, corto de duración y ameno de pasar, me encanto, sobre todo porque el verdadero reto es descubrir todos sus finales, los mejores son los finales 17 y 20, recomendadisimo y además no toma mucho tiempo, ideal si quieres pasar un pequeñísimo rato jugándolo, además también puedes optar por las guías para descubrir todos sus finales si te quedas atascado en alguna parte.

CALIFICACION
8/10

32453868.review:
Confess My Love es una representación de todas las formas en las que alguien responde a tus sentimientos.
Es un videojuego basado principalmente en los distintos finales que puedes conseguir, acompañados de una buena banda sonora. Los personajes son muy planos y la jugabilidad es 0. Es verdad que no se busca este tipo de características en esta clase de juegos pero la forma de conseguir todos los finales está muy mal planteada, ya que se basa principalmente en un reloj. Que va "cambiando de hora" y que segun su número y las opciones que decidas, conseguirás diversos finales. Esto es un método sencillo y muy cómod de programar, pero muy tedioso y frustante al jugar. Vas a estar, sobretodo al principio, esperando, esperando y asi un buen rato.
Pero el conjunto, para un indie con muy pocos recursos, está guay y mola las respuestas de la protagonista y los cambios psicológicos que va teniendo.
Darle una oportunidad que es muy corto y los dibujos son kawaiis :)

32437508.review:
那天看到这个游戏免费又是国产所以抱着试一下的态度下载了。
游戏本身很小，所以这样的游戏我也没有在画面上报什么期望。
游戏音乐不错在游玩4小时后主旋律仍然不会觉得刺耳。但在“场景”交换时缺少过度，让人在听到某些bgm后就能预感到该发生什么。缺少一部分的新奇感。
人物塑造特点还算突出。但女主可能是为了一次一次拒绝而换了许多不同的性格，有些模糊不清。
剧情前期给人平淡的感觉。初次游玩还在期待下一周目可能会攻略女主。（用周目解锁道具还是有些烦人）中期进入特殊场景后马上感到新鲜有趣。想要了解全部的剧情。不过一次又一次重新刷确实降低了游戏的体验。到了游戏的最后恍然大悟。但文本数量有些欠缺，希望有更多的台词突出剧情和人物性格。
全部通关后的无法重新开始游戏让我眼前一亮。我觉得这种游戏一周目即可，无需浪费时间游玩二周目，作者也想到了。而且用主菜单的细节又给玩家一种出乎意料的体验。或许之后我会因为这个原进行游戏的二周目。
作为一款小游戏及作者的兴趣制作，它是成功的，当玩家不知道该做些什么的时候，试试这款游戏吧，会给你们一个又一个小惊喜的。

32395164.review:
花了大约三小时通关了这款游戏（期间借助了攻略的力量），游戏的后半段我是开着最炫民族风坚持着通关的，感谢作者团队的创作！很棒的游戏体验！

---------------------------------------------------------------------
购入游戏之初，是冲着游戏的标题《告白日》而去的。买之前大致看了一下游戏的流程是3个小时左右，觉得能顺利通关于是马上开始玩了。
主人公要怎样告白呢？整个游戏都围绕着“告白”是否能成功展开吗？可以的话我想试试看自己的告白能力。带着这样的想法我开始了游戏。

-------------------以下可能剧透---------------------
最开始游戏进行十分正常，在简单了解之后，我大致了解了游戏的流程：
有多种结局，通过不同的选项能出发不同的结局。
“我想玩出成功告白的GoodEnding结局！”带着这样的想法我继续玩了下去。

然而……
一道若隐若现的血光出现了。是我看错了？
还是我想错了？这并不是一个单纯美好的恋爱游戏？

因为游戏进行过程不顺利，不得已之下我借助了攻略的力量。
打开攻略后，这个游戏的另外一个世界：里世界打开了。

里世界部分的游戏流程建议借助攻略完成，某些情节请借助如“最炫民族风”之类的劲歌乐曲来缓解紧张的气氛。游戏的结局属于：意料之外，情理之中。

推荐有时间的小伙伴享受这三小时的游戏过程。
最后感谢游戏制作者，也感谢做过很多此类游戏实况的UP主：泪腺战士（岚少）。

没有剧透，没有剧透，没有剧透，重要的事情先说三遍，考虑入手游戏却怕被剧透的放心观看。
      花了较长时间通关了这个游戏，最初以为只是个恶搞游戏来着，感觉主角蛮可怜的。
      虽然之前因为怎么也刷不出来某些成就去查了攻略知道了一些事情，不过玩到第16-19个成就时还是被吓了一跳，结果没来得及跑先达成了17成就233。
      看一些评论说知道结尾出乎意料本来已经有所准备，不过玩到结局的时候还是被结局振到了。震惊之余还有一些感动（说震惊有点夸张），回头看看之前的每一个结局，似乎都代表了主角的不同心理状态。
      总之没玩过的建议你玩一玩，我给推荐。



      最后献给没收集全成就却不想直接照着攻略玩的朋友，前16个成就需要在左面时间显示1-4时尝试和女主进行不同的对话选项，还有一个成就需要在游戏开始前5秒就跑去找她对话。也可以尝试超时到时间5看看有什么结局。还有隐藏成就，试着删除游戏目录下system文件夹中后几位是save2的文件再进一次游戏。

32270817.review:
这是一个作者纯粹为了练习程序做的游戏。
游戏优点很明显，游戏程序设计很花哨，多结局推动剧情虽然不是原创，不过也还算有趣。画面考虑到自制素材和立绘，也还算精致，但是分辨率实在低。
缺点更明显，首先等待时间回收结局非常繁琐。建议加入“等待”选项可以直接跳到下一分钟。其次对话时虽然对话内容可以跳过，但是诸如“音符”“爱心”等动画效果不能跳过而且十分占用时间，强行延长游戏时间。既然作者是为了秀技术才做的这个游戏，那这些程序上的优化请事先做好。
最后，最大的问题是剧本。前20个结局简直用脚写的，完全无逻辑，大部分结局也没有任何亮点，只是让不断重复玩家繁琐的回收工作。其次世界观设定也十分老套，毫无新意。但是考虑到作者只想秀技术，剧本只是为了系统而存在，这种程度也还凑合。

说真的，以后还是少做这种花哨的无聊游戏吧。免费游戏也不是用来浪费时间的。这种RPGMaker系统设计范例没有必要发到steam上来。

补
实话说我也不是很懂系统。我只是希望国产能少一点噱头少一点花哨，把重点放到游戏内容上，不要再做特效比内容吸引眼球的游戏了。我宁可玩一款内容无聊的朴实的游戏，也不想玩一款内容无聊亮点在系统/画面/音乐上的游戏。因为前者开发者可以知道自己的不足，后者仗着内容以外的亮点，可能就因此沾沾自喜，不再精进游戏内容了。
但是对于没有真的打算走游戏制作这条路的制作小组来说，就当我没说吧。兴趣还是自己开心就好。

32220756.review:
I highly recommend this game! It's free to play, with multiple endings; you will get the most out of this experience if you play it all in one sitting. Although the concept is really nothing new (a tale of unrequited love and the anguish it can cause), the game presents this concept in a unique way. I would love to see this game expanded upon because it really leaves you wanting more. 

The sprites are adorable and the sound/music really helps set the tone. The writing, despite a few grammar errors here and there, is simple but adds realism in the dialogue between characters (and the inner thoughts of the main character). The humor is a nice touch, which juxtaposes very well with more disturbing elements later on. This game doesn't rely on blood or jumpscares to frighten you. The sense of fear is cumulative; like a chill slowly running up your spine which gradually increases as the game progresses.  If I had to compare it to another game, I would say it reminded me of "Hello?...Hell...o?" 

Confess my Love involves a lot of experimentation, perfect timing, close attention to minor details, interesting puzzles to solve and plenty of trial-and-error gameplay. The entirety of the game takes place in a single setting, with only three characters. The minimalistic approach and seemingly innocent story really lulls you into a false sense of security. You think you know what will happen next, or you think you know exactly what to expect. But there's a lot more beneath the surface!

32220696.review:
4个小时 40周目 21次 被甩 

刚玩的 时候还是很蛋疼的因为 不知道结局怎么触发，后来查了 攻略才知道。不看攻略鬼才能全成就吧。

虽然前期刷刷刷 很无聊，但是随着剧情的深入，无聊感就会消失。适合闲的蛋疼的无聊人士来玩。毕竟 一直被甩很难受的。

就像作者说的，游戏本身及其无聊，基本你玩了半个小就会为了看剧情而看攻略。为了看到剧情你必须花几个小时重复及其无聊的操作，其实我没打完，因为剧情的吸引力已经被无聊盖过了，有没有人可以直接剧透下的。
或许剧情很好，但还不如做成VN，做成解谜（这游戏还有解谜？）就是最大的失败。
说到解谜，我实在没在隐藏结局的触发方式上找到什么逻辑关系（正常结局的触发方式就更加迷幻了）。又如作者说的，不看攻略几乎不可能通关，换句话说，几乎所有玩家，都会陷入看攻略，然后机械式地推完这么个境地。就像之前说的，与其强行喂屎，不如做个VN大家一起蛤皮。当然如果作者就是为了自嗨那我也没话说。。。
总之：我是没玩过这么无聊的游戏。。。

那么怎么玩这个游戏呢？你只需要下载，然后打开游戏，最小化窗口就可以了。游戏最美好的部分就是主菜单的bgm，什么时候出ost我一定买。

Frustrating game to the max! The fact that its time based to unlock certain endings was a terrible choice. Seems like you need so many endings to even get all the puzzle pieces unlocked as well. Then again the frustration of having to go through all the chat dialogs because honestly, the fast chat option barely works due to all the emoticons the characters do. 

I can't even get past the last 5 endings because you have to achieve it under 3 mins. I can never get the sequence right in time because of the controls being so flunky, making me get stuck places since you can only interact with everything if you do it in the correct spot. Also the clock keeps ticking when it transfers certain items in your inventory... You're just watching your precious seconds tick away stuck doing nothing, just waiting for the item to go in the inventory. 

I wanted to get the True Ending, but in the end I couldn't get past the 3 min time mark. Thus this game was a waste of time for me. I do not recommend.

32189035.review:
This is a great example of horrible game design.

Most of the endings are timing based. You walk up to the girl, waits for X minutes, presses A. Repeat again with a different amount of time to get another ending. Sounds fun?
More items gets unlocked as you progress, but this is just a ploy for you to check them out unnecessarily, as you need all of them to get any use of them. And then you can unlock the remaining endings, if you happen to know the specific timing and special conditions which you have no chance of guessing. So you shouldn't try to play this game without the guide/tip page, which is even recommended in the game description.
What really killed it for me was ending 16, which suddenly required you to do something which isn't possible in the rest of the game without any indication that you were even required to take action. Furthermore it is a timed section with very little leeway. But worst of all, if you mess it up you need to spend nearly 5 minutes to get back to the same point. Even after knowing what I should do, it took nearly 30 minutes for me get that ending.
And the secret steam achievement? According to the walkthrough [spoiler]you need to delete your save file in the install folder[/spoiler], meaning you can't get it in-game.

So what about the story? Sadly nothing worth noting. Each normal ending is like 15 sentences long, with the special endings being slightly longer. It is not straight out bad, but the content is still below average for a free game. The last ending is okay, but it is too little too late.

However the graphics is decent and the music is better than what I would expect (from a free game).

TL;DR: It is straight up boring, 3 hours of waiting and repeating the same thing over and over again. And the 15 minutes of storyline is not worth it.

32164025.review:
I actually had to look up what conditions the various scenarios occur under because I got stuck with the same ending after trying over and over-- and was very unimpressed the the different lose scenarios are generally dependent on [spoiler]just how long you're in the room before you talk to her[/spoiler]. It really pissed me off that there are so many "endings" which are just achieved through [spoiler]waiting, essentially[/spoiler] instead of dependent on anything you can actually do. Those ending don't logically mesh with each other, because she says completely different things every time that contradict with one another and the changes aren't things that the amount of time you waste will logically change. I haven't got the RNG ending yet, though the RNG element is cheap considering games like this should make success actually dependent on your behaviour not randomness or even what the other fail scenarios are. I do say yet-- I'll update this review with any further thoughts if it has a strong affect on me.

But ultimately, I had no fun, I felt no challenge, and I wasn't sufficiently motivated by it to try to figure it out.

Данная инди игрулька имеет довольно простенький на первый взгляд сюжет, но он гораздо сложнее. Рассказывать о нём я не стану, это стоит пройти самому. Все объяснения даются только к 20 концовке и оно того стоит, поверьте. Я влюблён в эту игру, как Вилли в Лизу. Пройти первые 10 концовок было просто, а после 15 я полез искать гайды, так как для некоторый концовок необходимо сделать множество действий, до которых проблематично самому допереть.

[h1]Итог[/h1]
Если знаете английский, то обязательно стоит сыграть.
[spoiler]Переводчики никто не отменял, дерзайте[/spoiler]

10 тортиков из 10.
P.S. Прохождение всех концовок является обязательным, это того стоит.

这款游戏的模式蛮少见的，通过一个结局，来增加下一周目的条件要素，从而达到另外一个结局。一开始着实让我摸不着头脑，我不相信有人不看攻略可以达到全结局。
我觉得还是要在关卡中多设计点提示，不然要看攻略才能达成全结局的话，体验就有点差吧，大概。
游戏剧情设计的还可以，就是16，17两个结局，感觉突然从恋爱养成游戏，变成了恐怖游戏，吓我一跳。
总而言之，不错的游戏，可以自己先摸索一下，然后在看攻略达成全结局吧，推荐！

32138983.review:
[h1][b]Review: Confess My Love[/b][/h1]
Wow, ich hab wirklich keine Erwartungen an dieses kostenlose Spiel gehabt und wurde vorzüglich unterhalten. Man spielt im Grunde den verliebten Protagonisten Willie der immer wieder bei Liza, deiner Schulkollegin welche mit ihren Hausaufgaben beschäftigt ist, abblitzt. Liza hat je nach Situation unterschiedliche Antworten parat bei denen ich mir teilweise dachte, man bräuchte eine wirklich dicke Haut um im echten Leben das durchzustehen... und die Begründungen sind wirklich fies! *gg*

Das Ende war unerwartet und hat mich total überrascht!

Für sämtliche Achievements ist man zwangsläufig auf den Walktrough angewiesen, da man gefühlt nur 70-80% durch simples probieren und erforschen erreichen kann. Bezüglich Controllerunterstützung habe ich keine guten Erfahrungen gemacht. Mein Xbox 360 Controller wurde nur teilweise erkannt und in wirklichkeit zahlt es sich auch nicht aus das Spiel im Big Picture zu spielen, weil es keinen Vollbild-Modus gibt. Nur mit dem Kürzel "Strg + Enter" kann man ein Vollbild erzwingen, was allerdings keine Besserung auf dem TV bringen würde. Im Fenster-Modus ist das Bild irrsinnig klein. In der Anleitung wird zu Beginn noch darauf hingewiesen dass man mit der Taste "F5" zumindest die Fenstergröße verdoppeln kann, was ich auch empfehle. Die Steuerung an der Tastatur ist ein wenig holprig - man gewöhnt sich aber schnell daran und ich hatte nur bei einem Achievement ein bisschen zu kämpfen. :-)

Wenn euch das Review gefallen hat, dann lasst es mich mit einem Daumen nach oben wissen!

32123982.review:
initially, when i tried doing the time-based endings, it was frustratingly boring. so much so, i was nearly inclined to give it a thumbs down.

then came the bit where i was doing a combination of other things to get the other endings ... and that was where it became so so much better. the 'truth' slowly reveals itself as you progress through the different endings, and in the end, it was a fairly touching story.

sure, some parts of the translations weren't very well done, but i guess for something this simple, and hey, free! one cant complain too much. it's a fairly decent game overall, that you can slowly nibble on (each playthrough wont last more than 5 minutes).

32121542.review:
吐槽：刚开始为了区分是时间触发还是物品触发，费了点小功夫，搞明白结局出现规律后补完普通结局。
为了逐渐增加的时间条件，玩家必须等待，从0-5分。过程枯燥。
或许为了不让玩家太过无聊，紫毛会有慢慢变化的闲聊来消磨时间。同时也是男主情感的交流地。
普通结局补完然后碎片才能集齐，特殊结局才可以触发。
借水杯，倒水，浇花，收集碎片，开日记本，拿钥匙开抽屉，找蛋糕，送紫毛请离开，拉掉两个窗帘。这些活动本身没有价值，仅仅是拿到小刀的必须关卡，也就没了惊喜。它占用时间而且枯燥乏味没有意义，尤其是当重复的时候。为了完成这些活动，时间还要充裕而不能被压缩。
原因异变结局出现有概率性，要想拿出异变结局，必须完成以上流程，还是限时的。大约1/3可能进入异变房间，出现本作唯一一个操作关卡。假如逃脱结局失败{容易}，那最好是关了游戏重启，再次刷1/3的概率进入。可恨是中间可能刷出空无一人的偶然关卡。所以这一过程必须被刷刷刷好几次，很烦。而且如果没有攻略，我会认为这游戏也就这样了，不会想到达到特殊结局的条件，也就错过了最终结局的机会。
鼓励：虽然游戏不大，但BGM多样而且切景，非常不错。带着青春特有的感伤和美好。
细节也很不错，比如角色的表情和停顿，黑板上相同的日期，不断增加的旗子数。
地图只有一张，一直存在的角色也就三人。故事却这么多，意外。
五五开吧 。

32119701.review:
Played for half an hour, I can see the charm and the appeal to it.
I think the style is cute.

The translation to English needed some work. Many sentences are garbaled English, and some just don't make sense whatsoever. Sometimes the tense is off and there are misspellings. It's difficult to get pulled into the story when you're seeing mistakes in it.

Walking was difficult, you could tell even from the pink hair'd sprite leaving that there is a specific pattern, no regular person walks that way so it does look jarring and it can be frustrating to control.

For a free game, it's worth the practice and feedback to build a better game next time.

32115714.review:
If this game had cost even a dollar I'm not sure I'd be able to recommend it. Fortunately it's free, so the multiple issues, such as: extremely repetitive gameplay, the annoying randomness of certain endings, and the really poor English translation are really at your discretion as to whether or not it's worth it to play.

Despite my complaining, I did have fun with this game, it's very short and pretty cute, plus the aforementioned translation problems are more comedic than anything, and generally you can gleam whatever the intent of the sentence was anyway. If not for the translation, I could easily see this game being a hit with Youtubers, it's that type of game. It's also quite intiative, I didn't need to use a guide until the 15th or 16th ending. Overall, I don't regret giving it my time.

P.S. If you're someone who cares about achievements: As I understand, you need to launch the game from Steam for the achievements to work. I've completed the game and got all the endings, but I used the desktop shortcut so most didn't show up ):

32095486.review:
A very nice, short little story with 20 different endings and many secrets to unfold.

This game is entirely story-driven with puzzle-solving and dialogue choices being your tools for progression so going into further detail would spoil the fun. Please do yourself a favour and install it right away if it as much as crossed your mind. It is completely free so you have nothing to lose but time and the game does not overstay its welcome. I feel I must give props to the soundtrack as well, for a free indie game especially. I loved the calming yet somber piano.

Although there are a few spelling errors, I confidently recommend Confess My Love if you've got two to three hours to spare and you're looking for something easy to digest yet with an element of puzzle solving.

Отличная бесплатная игра на один вечер, если есть немного терпения, нет неприязни к стилистике (см. скриншоты) и все хорошо с английским.
По сути простой квест с 20 концовками, зависящими от времени и твоих действий. На все про все - 5 минут.
Я лично открыл 13, за остальными пришлось листать гайд (есть неподалеку в разделе Руководства в Центре сообщества; гайд годный, без спойлеров). 
Чтобы открыть тру-концовку, надо открыть 19 остальных - без гайда это почти нереал, т.к. в некоторых концовках много условий, связанных с предыдущими прохождениями.

Confess My Love is pretty good for a free game. The game tells the story of a young man who must decide to tell confess his love to his crush. This seems pretty simple, but gets more complicated as the many layers of love emerge. 

Things I like:

+ Story is pretty crazy
+ All the different endings
+ Music (wish there was more)
+ How weird the game gets

Things I disliked:

- Controls are pretty bad (especially during a certain sequence)
- Poor choice in using rng for a certain thing
- The translation is pretty bad

Overall, Confess My Love is a fun time waster that's free. There's really no downside to picking the game up tbh. If you do pick it up, you will most likely find yourself drawn into getting all the various endings.

6.5/10

32058506.review:
Still waters run deep. Confess My Love is more than a cute and quick 20 x 5 minute game to complete to see all the endings. There's something to be uncovered, but at some point it becomes frustrating to advance from the initial scenario.

The pixel graphics are adorable, detailed and overall eminently well made. The same can be said about the dynamically changing music with its music box tunes reminiscent of shoujo anime. Regarding the writing, it's alright and reasonably understandable, despite its translation errors. There are no ambiguities, misunderstandings or confusion, just a few awkward constructions but nothing that would kill the mood. Also, improvements to the translation are supposedly under way.

Story wise, Confess My Love starts out with an eponymous straightforward task. Given one afternoon in one room with variables, the player is prompted to repeat his effort to finally succeed and get the girl. Soon, after a few attempts and different outcomes, it becomes clear that some sort of magical Groundhog Day takes place. And this is where, in my opinion, some questionable game design decisions emerge.

Progress through the story is hidden by a one in three chance of a continuative scenario to appear after the completion of one very specific and comparably lengthy scenario composition. And even if the next step is reached, to further proceed to the true ending, a new approach to solving a scene, i.e. running away, is introduced without making the player aware of that possibility. To top it off, having to run in a game where the controls are rather rudimentary can lead to a lot of frustration. Summarising my main complaint: Discovering the way to proceed, figuring out how to solve the situation and executing the solution all come with countless trial and error. Failure is likely and the possibility to try is gated behind a one in three chance to occur. The publisher seems to be aware of that and provided a tips page to help players who are stuck, which is very kind to do.

All in all Confess My Love is not a bad game per se. It just has a few unclear elements which are unfortunately fundamental for the plot to develop. Not as inexplicable as beating Psycho Mantis, but still antiquated and bothersome. If a little peeking into the solution isn't a problem, then the story that unfolds can be worth it.

32058279.review:
Well just finished the game and I enjoyed it for what it was worth to get the Steam achievements. It took me about 3 hours to get them all, but I tend to be thorough with my games anyway so i'm sure others can get them faster. So I was able to get the game to work.

As for the game, there are several parts of the game with "Engrish" in it. Even though the game translators could've done a better job, its still understandable. I also found the game a bit tedius trying to get all the endings. I even, had to look up a guide someone posted in the forums in order to get the rest of them when I got stuck. However, if you can get past the games' shortcomings the story is pretty interesting and each ending is funny in its own way. Its also easy to identify with the MC since most of us have been in that dillemma of whether or not to confess to our secret crush while growing up in school.

In any case, the game is free so you can't really complain about the cons of the game. So if you've got a couple hours to spare give this game a try. I liked it at least.

I've been enjoying this game very much. For it being free, you do get a good amount of gameplay. The game is very repetitive, having you repeat the same tasks and giving you an ending based on the circumstances of your run through. Once you figure out what's going on, the repetitiveness  isn't necessarily a bad thing, but can get frustrating at times. 

The translation isn't very good which can be difficult. Some controls I didn't realize for the end is that you can 
Open your inventory with X
AND RUN WITH SHIFT (this is important) 

The game was enjoyable and boy does it take a turn near the end of the endings list. The entire game is centered around achieving all of the endings, so if you're not about small puzzles, and sometimes tedious tasks, I would consider avoiding it. But all around it was a pretty good experience, and I've already recommended it to a couple of my friends.

32036489.review:
本作类似[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/354240/Please_Dont_Touch_Anything/]《Please, Don’t Touch Anything「请勿乱动」》[/url]和[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/496890/Replica/]《Replica「替代品」》[/url]。是个短流程多结局的游戏。如果你对上面这类游戏有些兴趣那么还是可以来试试这款游戏的。不过，还是先做好受苦的准备吧。
社区已有[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=934543812]搬运自作者的乐乎的指南[/url]。
悄悄附一个自己在SteamCN论坛写的[url=https://steamcn.com/t275052-1-1]全成就攻略[/url]（笑）

[h1]简评[/h1]
[b]优点：[/b]
[list]
    [*]免费小游戏
    [*]音乐不错
    [*]画风尚可
    [*]主菜单设计蛮有意思的
    [*]国人制作，自带简中
    [*]大概也算是还有点内涵吧
[/list]

[b]缺点：[/b][b]作者绝壁是个抖S[/b]
[list]
    [*]游戏共有20个结局，分为15个普通结局、4个特殊结局和1个真结局。但是大多数普通结局的分支竟然取决于[b]你表白的时间[/b]而非[b]你在游戏中的行为[/b]。从游戏性上来讲近乎为零，只是为了解锁结局而解锁结局。[spoiler]说难听些，算是凑数恐怕也并不为过[/spoiler][spoiler]大概是作者想让我们体验花式被拒的感觉吧？[/spoiler]
    [*]结局16必须通过结局7进入。即按攻略完成结局7后，下一次点击开始游戏时[b]有几率[/b]进入结局16的房间。[u][b]所以当你想要完成结局16时，先按攻略重新完成结局7然后重新开始，开局注意座位前方的紫毛在不在，如果紫毛在的话请立刻关闭游戏然后重新打开（建议先把你的好友在线状态切换为离线否则怕是好友-N），不在的话那么恭喜你，这就是结局16的房间，此时你必须从前门逃跑，否则进入结局17，因此一旦被抓，也请务必立刻关闭游戏。否则你只能不断重新完成用时最长最累人的结局7直到你顺利通过第16结局。这是我浪费了两个小时（我总游戏时间才3小时）重刷十几遍结局7总结出来的血泪史，切记切记！[/b][/u]噢?你问我为什么要把这条放在缺点里？因为我每次逃跑的时候都会撞到迷之桌角然后被抓住又重来一遍……
    [*][strike]游戏结局共有20个，但是成就有21个，最后一个隐藏成就“等下？！”目前尚无人得到，我猜测应该是在最后的房间能拿到，但是，你一旦离开了最后的房间，就会“空间不存在，初始化失败”然后游戏自动关闭，卸载重装、从账户移除重新添加也是如此，因此你多半已与全成就无缘。[spoiler]作者怕是和我这种强迫症有仇[/spoiler][/strike]
[spoiler]已从作者在讨论贴的回复中找到了隐藏成就的解锁方式：删除或重命名游戏system中的system.rvdata2文件，然后重启游戏。[/spoiler]
[/list]








[spoiler]最后的题外话：年轻人，怂……是要输一辈子的呀[/spoiler]

32029167.review:
致青春：
你的校园生活中，你是否还记得你的初恋？你是否曾经有喜欢过的那个人？你是不是犹豫着要不要告诉ta 你的心意？
初恋是懵懂而美好的，这款游戏让我想起了我的初恋，我曾经无比喜欢的那个人，我曾经因为那个人而变的文艺、学会包容和懂得温柔，那个带给我无限动力的那个人，你现在还好么？已经过了12年了，虽然我已经将你淡忘，但我仍旧要感谢你，正因为有你我才能变成现在这样温暖的人。
致初恋：
时光荏苒生命如歌，我还记得我对你的承诺，我还记得我给你写过的诗词，我还记得我从一个害羞的人变成了一个健谈的人。这一切的一切都是因为有你。
致回忆：
人生能有几个真正喜欢过的人，而你又能直言面对自己的感情吗，你会对你心仪的人说出那句话吗？你能正确的把握时机么？

这是一款非常不错的游戏，除了视角和操作非常不好以外没有任何可以说的缺点，告白需要掌握技巧、时机和一些重要的因素。
期待改进视角，其实传统的RPG 视角是没问题的，复古才能让人想起那份过去的回忆，这款游戏是个璞玉，如果经过更加细致的雕刻，他将会变的光芒四射，成为一块耀眼的石头。
初恋的那份感情，小小而又珍贵，青涩而又质朴，甜蜜而又苦涩。

32018974.review:
说实话不应该对免费游戏要求太多，而且开发者本人也说了玩这游戏可能是浪费时间。
那么我就胆大地说了，玩这个游戏确实是浪费时间。
如果要我说的好听些是无聊，说难听就是烂。
这个画风考虑到免费，对于没啥美术基础的人来说不错了。
这个剧情，我真的是要好好吐槽一番。


一般我见过剧情最差的是小品级黄油，主要靠cg吸引人气。而这部作品的剧情，即使在小黄油里也只能排中下等。一开始吸引我的是多周目和推理因素。后来我发现我根本找不到推理的价值。这个游戏的剧情发展，和玩家的智慧关系不大，而和玩家刷了多少个end相关。就像一款横版过关游戏，你能不能过关与你操作无关，而与你死了多少次，换了多少次死法有关。这是多么奇葩的机制啊，强迫玩家刷刷刷啊！ok这也不是第一个公司这么做了。可是别的刷多周目的游戏，有的有精美收集，你一个免费小游戏没有正常。可是那些没cg的多周目游戏多个周目剧情层层递进，要不然就突然反转另有隐情。这个游戏的多周目剧情就是天女散花，奇怪的分支把主线都模糊了，几乎感觉不到推进。说来也可笑，剧情的推进需要推理刷end，而新的end需要剧情推进。

简单来说别的游戏是你绞尽脑汁避免失误进行下去，必要时候gameover但是发现新内容。这款游戏是你绞尽脑汁作死才能在无数次gameover时找到新的gameover方式。无数个end剧情发展让人摸不到头脑，人物性格变化巨大，我都怀疑这些npc有人格障碍，不同end至少人物的主要性格不能变吧，就算变你也要有个变得过程吧。不能今天乖乖女明天小太妹不是？

还有个失误就是在游戏里提到《白夜行》《人间失格》《告白》，让我以为这款游戏会有让人大呼精彩的情节或者精妙的反转，然而我看到的是一头雾水的剧情和俗套无聊的情节。显然作者编故事的能力并不强。感觉提到这几本书是强行提高逼格，跟剧情没得关系。

整体评价一下
优点：
免费+1
国产有中文+1
画风及格+1
音乐随剧情会变+1
作者态度和蔼
缺点：
编剧能力差-1
剧情推进机制怪异
确实浪费时间
自制新素材少

总分3/10

如果不是真的无事可做不推荐玩
